loans.name: Olinda Esther

texts.es:
OLINDA ESTHER O. RAMAINA
La señora Olinda Esther  es socia del banco comunal Luchando por nosotras, del distrito de yarinacocha, departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 46 años madre de familia con 2 hijos menores, Olinda con el afán de ayudar con los gastos básicos de la casa,  puso una pequeña bodega.
Olinda lleva 7 años trabajando con el banco comunal de Manuela Ramos y el dinero lo ha ido invirtiendo en su bodega para poder surtirlo.
Este ultimo crédito ha pedido a manuela ramos un pequeño préstamo de  s/. 1,700 nuevos soles, los mismos que invertirá en la compra de mercadería de la cuidad de lima, todo lo que es ropa  para ver si es rentable el negocio empezará  comprando  9  vestidos,  15 blusas, 12 pantalones,  12 polos, 6 shores, 6 faldas de jean, 12 sandalias.
La señora Olinda ya pensó agregar otro producto a su negocio y está segura que le va ir muy  bien, Olinda contenta por los logros obtenidos hasta el momento, su familia está bien   y eso le da tranquilidad.
Gracias a los préstamos de manuela ramos su familia, está mejorando su calidad de vida
texts.en:
OLINDA ESTHER O. RAMAINA

Olinda Esther is a member of the “Luchando por Nosotras” (Fighting for Us) communal bank in Yarinacocha district, Ucayali department.  She is 46 years old and has two minor children.  To help with household expenses, Olinda opened a small general store.  She has been collaborating with the Manuela Ramos communal bank for 7 years and has used funds to stock her store.

The last loan she requested from Manuela Ramos is a small, 1700 new sol loan, which she will use to buy merchandise in Lima.  She plans to buy clothes to see if they are profitable.  She will start out by buying 9 dresses, 12 blouses, 15 pants, 12 polo shirts, 6 shorts, 6 denim skirts and 12 sandals.

Olinda plans to add another product to her business and she is sure she will do well.  She is happy with her accomplishments to date.  Her family is well and that gives her peace of mind.

Thanks to Manuela Ramos loans her family’s quality of life is improving.

loans.use: To buy clothes.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, de 43 años, es un hombre que siempre ha luchado por mejorar su calidad de vida, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es tener un buen futuro. El cultivo de la arveja, papa y maíz es la actividad a la que se dedica Juan, todos los días desde muy temprano sale a trabajar a sus chacras, con el único fin de esforzarse mucho para que sus cultivos tengan muy buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y aún mantiene el mismo ritmo de cuidado que tiene hacía sus tierras, evitando que la plaga de insectos ataquen sus plantaciones. Con el tiempo espera sembrar más así tener una mejor producción. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, si quiere acceder a otro préstamo a futuro, en su banco comunal es un socio muy cumplido y activo. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más semillas de arveja, para ampliar sus actuales sembríos.
texts.en:
Juan, 43, is a man who has always fought to improve his quality of life.  He lives in his own house and his greatest desire is to have a good future.

Juan is a pea, potato and corn farmer.  He goes out daily very early in the morning to work his fields.   His sole goal in mind is to work hard so that his crops are of good quality.  What he enjoys the most about his work is tilling the soil.  He has been a farmer for 20 years and still maintains the same rhythm of care for his fields, avoiding insect infestations that attack the plants.  In time, he hopes to plant more in order to have better production.

This is his 8th loan with MFP.  He knows that he has to repay on time if he wants to have access to future loans.  He is a prompt and active member of his communal bank.

He will use the requested 2000 new soles to buy pea seed to enlarge his current plantings.

loans.use: To buy pea seed

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose S. lives in the Kawempe neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has 4 children, all of whom are in school.   She also takes care of additional family members (3 relatives).    

Rose has a tailoring business.  She has been in this business for 10 years and she works 6 days out of every week. Rose works in a shop, by means of retail.    

Rose has requested a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more  clothing materials like African Tunics (Gomesi skirts and blouses) and threads. She also generates additional income through selling bricks and repairing torn clothes.

The main business challenges for Rose are transportation and defaulters.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are starting a tailoring school and also owning a bridal boutique.   

Rose lives in a home that she owns; she doesn't have access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more clothing materials and threads

loans.name: El Arbolito Group

texts.es:
ALCOM “EL ARBOLITO”
La Sra. Carmen Rosa S. A., ejerce el cargo de presidenta de la alcancía, tiene 44 años vive en el AA.HH los Heraldos de Motupe, distrito de San Juan de Lurigancho, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos, dos independientes y un pequeño  de 5 añitos.
  La alcancía esta  formada por 10 entusiastas y forjadoras  socias, un grupo solidario muy unido y comprometido con los propósitos que tienen tanto a nivel grupal como familiar; ellos vienen trabajando con nosotros hace dos años y están  agradecidos por los logros obtenidos porque  vieron cada una de ellas sobresalir a sus familias y tener mejores condiciones de vida.
  Carmen se dedica a la venta de comida en un mercado cercano a la casa donde vive, hace seis  años que viene realizando este negocio, pero  gracias a este trabajo y los apoyos que recibe de EDAPROSPO – PROSPERIDAD al otórgale  los  créditos logró  darle  una mejor educación a sus hijos y  construir el segundo piso de su casa.
  La Sra. Mery sueña con tener su restaurante en su propia casa, equipado  y con todas las comodidades que pueda tener un restaurante;  por  eso como  toda madre luchadora y entusiasta ella no ven tan lejos este sueño, porque con el reciente préstamo adquirido lo utilizara para terminar con algunos acabados en su  casa  y así  poder empezar con el sueño que tanto anhela.
 Mery en la foto se encuentra de pie, viste un polo de color blanco, buzo de color azul.
texts.en:
“EL ARBOLITO” (THE LITTLE TREE) COMMUNAL BANK

Mrs. Carmen Rosa S. A. is the President of the communal bank.  She is 44 years old and lives in Los Heraldos de Motupe, San Juan de Lurigancho district.  She is married and has three children, two who are independent and a little 5-year-old.

The communal bank has 10 enthusiastic, pioneering members.  It is a much unified, mutually supportive, group that is committed both to the group and family goals they have set.  They have been collaborating with us for two years and are grateful for the accomplishments they have reached because each has seen her family stand out and have better living conditions.

Carmen sells food in a market near her home.  She has been in this business for six years.  Thanks to the work and financial help through loans from EDAPROSPO – PROSPERIDAD she has managed to provide better education for her children and to build a second story on her house.

Mery dreams with having a restaurant in her home equipped with all the comforts a restaurant can have.  Because of this, like all fighting, enthusiastic mothers, she sees this dream within her reach because she will use the recently granted loan to complete some of the house’s finishing touches to start toward the dream she so desires.

In the photo, Mery is standing wearing a white polo shirt and blue tracksuit.

loans.use: To complete some of the finishing touches on her house in order to start working toward her dream of having her own restaurant.

loans.name: Laberiano

texts.es: Liberiano, de 45 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es sobresalir en la vida. Desde muy joven Laberiano se dedico al cultivo de papa, arveja y maíz, ya que esta es la actividad que se ha realizado en su familia desde hace mucha generaciones, sus productos los vende a los compradores, que llegan hasta sus chacras, quienes posteriormente llevan el producto a vender a la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y aún mantiene el mismo ritmo, cuidando y procurando que sus plantaciones no sean perjudicadas por la plaga de insectos. Con el tiempo desea comprar más tierras para poder incrementar su producción. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas a tiempo y esta dispuesto a hacerlo, en su banco comunal es muy respetuoso con el resto de sus socias. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus tierras.
texts.en:
Liberiano, 45, is an unassuming, hard working man.  He lives in his own house and what he most wants is to get ahead in life.  From a very young age Liberiano has been a potato, pea and corn farmer since this is the activity his family has been in for many generations.  He sells his products to buyers that come by his fields and then take the product to be sold in Tarma.

What he enjoys most about the work is cultivating the fields, something he does with much dedication.  He has been farming for 25 years and still maintains the same work rhythm, caring for his plants ensuring that they aren’t damaged by insect infestations.  In time he’d like to buy more land to increase production.

This is his 8th loan with MFP.  He understands that he must repay on time and is willing to do so.  He is very respectful toward his fellow communal bank members.

He will use the requested one-thousand new soles to buy manure and fertilizers for his fields.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Muhangi

texts.en: Muhangi G. is 38 years old and married with six kids. He has an agro produce selling business. For the most part, he sells bananas and tomatoes in Kagango-Ntungamo. He has been doing this for the last 15 years and weekly his business generates 120,000 shillings. This business, he says, was started with family support after he finished school. He says with this loan, he is going to purchase manure to improve his banana plantations.

loans.use: To purchase manure to improve his banana plantations

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, de 24 años es una joven madre de familia muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad de vida. En los verdes campos del poblado de Cochayoc (Distrito de la provincia de Tarma), Margarita tiene sus cultivos de papa y arveja. Todas las mañanas sin importarle las condiciones del clima sale a trabajar sus tierras, ya que es la única fuente de ingresos para su familia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y aún sigue cuidando sus plantaciones de la plaga de insectos. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras para incrementar su producción. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP y esta ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde se siente muy contenta. Con los mil doscientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Margarita, 24, is a young, unassuming, hard working mother.  She lives in her own house and what she most desires is to improve her quality of life.  Margarita farms potatoes and peas in the green countryside of Cochayoc, a district in Tarma province.  Every morning, regardless of weather conditions, she goes out to work her fields because this is her family’s sole source of income.

What she enjoys the most about the work is cultivating the land, something she does with much dedication.  She has been farming for 4 years and continues caring for her crops keeping them safe from insect infestations.  In time she’d like to buy more land to increase production.

This is her 8th loan with MFP and she is saving up in order to repay on time because she does not want to cause any problems for the members of her communal bank where she feels very happy.

She will use the requested 1200 new soles to buy more manure and fertilizers for her crops.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Enock

texts.en:
Enock is a married man with two children aged 11 and 3.  He operates a retail shop for a living.  Addionally, he runs a cafeteria.  

Enock has been running his business for two years and he hopes to expand his business premise and introduce other products such as cosmetics and stationery.  As a result, he has requested a loan for 60,000 KES.  

He hopes to improve his living standards in the future.  In five years, he sees himself growing his business into wholesale.

loans.use: To buy new products to expand retail business

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofía, D. 53 años es una mujer que a lo largo D. su vida siempre ha luchado por tener un buen futuro, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es tener una vejez tranquila. A través D. estos años Sofía ha trabajado muy duro para que sus cultivos sean D. muy buena calidad, todas las mañanas trabaja sus tierras, para que sean más productivas. La papa y arveja que cultiva, lo venD. en el mercado D. la ciudad D. Tarma, ya que es ahí donD. le ofrecen mejores precios. Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es cosechar, lleva 35 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos, hasta los mercados donD. los venD.. Con el tiempo, espera poder sembrar todas sus tierras, para poder incrementar su producción. Es el octavo crédito con MFP y quiere pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que desea acceder a más préstamos, con lo cuales pueda mejorar su negocio, sabe que en su banco comunal la apoyarán y la guiarán, ya que es una socia muy querida. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará abono para mejorar la productividad D. sus chacras.
texts.en:
Sofía, 53, is a woman who has fought throughout her entire life to have a good future.  She lives in her own house and her greatest desire is to have a peaceful old age. Throughout the years Sofía has worked hard so that her crops will be of good quality.  Every morning she works the fields so that they will be more productive.  She sells the potatoes and peas she grows in Tarma’s market which is where the best prices are offered.

What she likes best about the work is harvesting.  She has been a farmer for 35 years and considers the most difficult part transporting the crops to the markets for sale.  In time she hopes to be able to plant on her entire fields in order to increase production.

This is her 8th loan with MFP and she wants to repay on time because she wants to be able to apply for future loans with which to improve her business.  She knows that her communal bank will support and guiD. her because she is a very well liked member.

She will use the requested 1000 new soles to buy manure to improve field productivity.

loans.use: To buy manure.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a 36-year-old married lady.  She is blessed with four children who are in school.  

For a living, she runs a grocery store.  This is her eighth year in the business.  She is a hardworking lady who hopes to venture into another business in the future.  

She has requested for 20, 000 KES to buy fingerlings as a way of diversification.   

She describes herself as hardworking.

loans.use: To buy fingerlings for resale

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es: Teofilo, de 32 años, es un hombre muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad de vida. Con muchas ganas de trabajar Teofilo sale todos los días a cultivar sus tierras, él tiene  principalmente sembríos de papa, arveja y maíz, productos que son rápidamente comprados en el mercado de la ciudad de Tarma, debido a la buena calidad que tienen. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras, ya que le cuesta mucho trabajo hacerlo, debido a lo amplio de sus cultivos. En adelante espera que su producción mejore, ya que de eso dependen sus ingresos. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP, esta muy feliz de haberlo obtenido y esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, en su banco comunal es muy querido. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para sus chacras, ya que desea que produzcan más.
texts.en:
Teófilo, 32, is a very cheerful, hard working man.  He lives in his own house and his greatest desire is to improve his quality of life.  With a strong wish to work, Teófilo goes out every day to work his fields.  He grows primarily potato, peas and corn, products that sell rapidly in Tarma’s market because of their good quality.

What he likes best about his work is cultivating the fields.  He has been a farmer for 8 years and considers fumigating the fields to be the most difficult task because it is very hard work due to the extent of his fields.  In the future he hopes production will improve because his income depends on it.

This is his 8th loan with MFP and he is very happy to have gotten it and is willing to repay punctually; he is very well liked in his communal bank.

He will use the requested 1000 new soles to buy more manure for his fields because he wants them to produce more.

loans.use: To buy manure.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is 34 years old and married with four children.  She owns and runs Pegra Auto Spares for a living.  She started the business six years ago.  She uses her income to support the family and educate her children.  She is a hardworking lady who hopes to expand her business into wholesale.  She has requested 60,000 Kes to buy spare parts to supply at wholesale.

loans.use: To buy spare parts

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy beer, soda and mineral water to resell

loans.name: Jones

texts.en: Jones is a businessman who distributes bread and cakes.  With income from his business, he is able to support his wife and child.  As a member of Faulu Kenya, he has been trained on how to keep business records.  With the training, he is able to run his business well.  His business is two years old and he has managed to employ one person. In addition, Jones runs a motorbike transport business to supplement his income.  He hopes to open a mini-supermarket in the future. He has requested 80,000 KES to buy bread and cakes.

loans.use: To buy bread and cakes.

loans.name: Bernarda

texts.es:
Bernarda forma parte del banco comunal “Esperanza y Fe” perteneciente  a la comuna de Independencia. En su triciclo ella sale a vender, desde hace veinte años, diarios, revistas y productos que los mismos periódicos entregan como promoción (colecciones especiales por ejemplo (Cds, ediciones especiales de autos y motos, etc.). Su esposo le ayuda cuando no tiene trabajos que hacer, ya que él trabaja de manera independiente como albañil. 
Con este préstamo, Bernarda comprará mercadería, principalmente productos de colección. Su sueño tener pronto un permiso para instalar el kiosco que tiene guardado,  en un lugar establecido. Ella ya hizo las gestiones y solo está esperando que le den la ubicación final. 
A Bernarda le ha servido mucho el apoyo de Fondo Esperanza, tanto económico como en la  orientación en los negocios.
Independencia es una de las 34 comunas que componen la ciudad de Santiago (capital de Chile), ubicada en el sector centro-norte. Se caracteriza por la presencia de edificios de mediana altura. Aquí se encuentra el Centro Cultural Indígena de Chile, entre otros 6 monumentos históricos de Chile.
texts.en:
Bernarda is a member of the “Esperanza y Fe” (Hope and Faith) communal bank in Independencia.  For 20 years she has gone out daily on her three-wheel vehicle to sell magazines, newspapers and products that the same newspapers offer on special sale (promotional items like special collections, CDs, special editions on cars and motorcycles, etc.).  Her husband helps her when he doesn’t have work since he works independently as a bricklayer.

Bernarda will use the loan to buy merchandise, primarily collectionables.  Her dream is to have a permit soon for a place to set up the kiosk she has stored.  She has already made the necessary requests and is only waiting for the final location to be assigned to her.  Support from Fondo Esperanza has been very helpful for Bernarda both economically and in business training.

Independencia is one of the 34 communes that make up the city of Santiago (capital of Chile).  It is located in the center-north sector and is noted for its buildings of medium height.  The Chilean Indigenous Cultural Center can be found here as well as six other Chilean historical monuments.

loans.use: For merchandise.

loans.name: Teddy

texts.en: Teddy K. lives in Nakulabye Neighborhood in the city of Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has two children, one of whom is in school. Teddy has a bar.  She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Teddy works from her home, by means of wholesale and retail. Teddy has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more crates of beer and jerycans of local gin. The main business challenge(s) for Teddy include thieves and defaulters.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are improving her welfare and going to Kasese districts for local gin. Teddy lives in a home that she rents. She has access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include rent and food.

loans.use: To buy more crates of beer and jerycans of local gin

loans.name: Eucebio Ernesto

texts.es:
Eucebio de 53 años, vende ropa y morocho en las calles de Guayaquil, vive con su esposa y dos hijos en el suburbio.

Hace 15 años el comenzó con el negocio de venta de ropa recorriendo un lugar muy conocido por los comerciantes informales llamado “Bahía”. Desde ese tiempo vende ropa de todo tipo, pero hace ocho año como quería ingresos adicionales para su familia decidió vender un postre llamado “morocho” con la ayuda de un familiar compro una carretilla para seguir recorriendo las calles vendiendo no solo ropa sino morocho. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 09h00am hasta las 16h00pm vendiendo ropa. Descansa después de haber vendido ropa por unas horas y ha partir de las 18h00pm hasta las 22h00pm vendiendo morocho. 

Para seguir con su negocio el quiere comprar ropa y el grano morocho para tener mas ingresos para su familia. En el futuro quiere tener una carreta mas grande para la venta al por mayor del morocho.
texts.en:
Eucebio is 53 years old.  He sells clothes and 'morocho' (a corn-based dessert) in the streets of Guayaquil.  He lives with his wife and children in the suburb.

He started his business selling clothes 15 years ago, working in a place called “Bahía” which is well known for its informal sellers.  Since then he has been selling all kinds of clothes but 8 years ago, as he wanted to make additional income for his family, he decided to start selling a dessert called 'morocho'.  With the help of a family member he bought a cart so that he could continue trading in the streets, selling not only clothes but also 'morocho'.  He currently works from 9.00am to 4.00pm selling clothes.  After he has finished selling his clothes he has a rest for a couple of hours then goes out again from 6.00pm to 10.00pm selling 'morocho'.

To continue with his business he would like to buy clothes and more corn for his 'morocho' so that he can make more income for his family.  In the future he would like to have a bigger cart so that he can sell 'morocho' wholesale.

loans.use: To buy clothes and corn for making 'morocho'

loans.name: Las Estrellas De Tula Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Estrellas de Tula y esta ubicado en el estado de Hidalgo México, esta comunidad es conocida por su nombre y tener un monumento representativo a un héroe nacional. El grupo esta conformado por 10 integrantes. La señora Apolonia C. se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos que inicio hace 27 años solicita el préstamo para seguir reacondicionando su local. Tiene 47 años estudio hasta la primaria y tiene 3 hijos ya mayores de edad y casados, sus clientes son en su mayoría  padres o alumnos de las escuelas ya que esta ubicado a unas cuadras de ellas,  al momento de solicitar su crédito ella se siente feliz y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brinda; quiere este crédito para continuar reacondicionando su local y así seguir mejorando su calidad de vida, tanto de ella como de su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called “Estrellas de Tula” (Tula Stars) and is located in the state of Hidalgo, México.  This community is known for its name and for having a monument dedicated to a national hero.  The group has 10 members.Mrs. Apolonia C. sells Mexican fast food.  She started her business 27 years ago and is asking for funds to continue to equip her eatery.  

She is 47 years old and finished elementary school.  She has three children who are now married adults.  Her customers, for the most part, are parents and school children because she’s located a few blocks from them.  

She is happy and grateful while asking for the loan because of the support it provides.  She wants the loan to continue refurbishing her locale and continue to improve her quality of life both for herself and for her family.

loans.use: To refurbish her food stand.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa tiene 50 años, de profesión docente, separada del padre de sus 3 hijos,  vive en su casa propia, hoy convertida en un centro de enseñanza. Después de haber trabajado  por muchos años en escuelas públicas se jubiló y paso a una vida tranquila en su casa. Es así que tuvo la iniciativa de emprender su propio en su casa, desde entonces trabaja muy  feliz enseñando a niños de 3 a 5 años, con los que juegan y cantan canciones infantiles. Lo que más le gusta de la docencia, es dar clases personalizadas, de acuerdo al carácter de cada niño. Es así que se ha ganado la confianza de los padres de familia, que dejan a sus hijos con mucha confianza. Inicialmente su colegio no tenia mucha acogida, pero gracias al empeño que pone, hoy sus clientes separan con tiempo la matricula de sus hijos. En adelante desea ampliar la infraestructura de su colegio. Es su 16avo crédito con MFP, y sabe que tiene que pagar puntualmente sus cotas y está dispuesta a cumplirlo como lo venía haciendo. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará cemento e inodoros de niños, para renovar las instalaciones de su centro educativo.
texts.en:
Elsa is 50 years old.  She is a teacher and is separated from the father of her 3 children.  She lives in her own home which she has converted into a learning center.  After having worked in state schools for many years, she retired and started leading a quiet life at home.  This is how she had the initiative to set up her own school in her home.

Since then she has been very happily teaching 3 – 5 year-old children with whom she plays and sings children's songs.  What she likes most about teaching is giving classes which are customized according to the character of each child.  This is how she has gained the trust of the children's parents who leave their children with her with confidence.  Initially her school wasn't very busy but thanks to the hard work which she has put in, today parents sign their children up quickly.

In the future she would like to expand the infrastructure of her school.  This is her 16th loan from MFP and she knows that she must make her repayments in a timely manner.  She is ready to do this as she has in the past.  She will use the loan to buy cement and children's toilets to renovate her school's facilities.

loans.use: To buy cement and toilets to improve her school's facilities

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José pertenece al banco comunal “La Hermandad” de la comuna de Maipú. Él tiene un puesto de  bazar y útiles de aseo, en una feria de su comuna, desde hace  11 años. Además fabrica pintura para el piso, oficio que le enseñó su cuñado. Comparte la mitad del puesto con su esposa, quien también trabaja con Fondo Esperanza y  confecciona, para vender, ropa de Barbie y ropa para el hogar, como por ejemplo sábanas, cortinas y manteles. Ambos trabajan todos los días de la semana en la misma feria,  pero en diferentes lugares de la comuna, ya que ésta va rotando. 
Con este préstamo, José comprará los materiales para fabricar pintura para piso y mercadería en general. Su sueño es arrendar un local establecido y  tener un vehículo, el cual le facilite el transporte de su mercadería, ya que ahora solo cuenta con un triciclo. 
José está muy agradecido de Fondo Esperanza, ya que gracias a los préstamos ha logrado adquirir más mercadería y aumentar sus ventas.
Maipú es una comuna ubicada al este de Santiago, capital de Chile. Designada como la comuna más grande de Chile es llamada Cuna de la Patria debido a importantes hechos históricos ocurridos en esas tierras durante la época de la Independencia.
texts.en:
José is a member of the “La Hermandad” (The Brotherhood) communal bank in Maipú.  He has had a stand selling house wares and cleaning supplies in a market in his commune for the last 11 years.  Besides, he also has a floor paint factory, an occupation his brother-in-law taught him.  He shares half the stand with his wife, who also collaborates with Fondo Esperanza; she makes clothes for Barbie dolls as well as items for the home like sheets, drapes and tablecloths.  Both work in the market every day but in different parts of the commune since the market rotates among them.

José will use this loan to buy materials to make floor paint and general merchandise.  His dream is to lease a fixed locale and have a vehicle which will ease merchandise transport because he currently only has a three wheel vehicle.

José is very grateful to Fondo Esperanza because thanks to the loans he has been able to acquire more merchandise and increase sales.

Maipú is a commune in the east of Santiago, capital of Chile.  It is the largest commune in Chile and known as the Birthplace of the Nation due to the important historical events that happened there during the Independence Era.

loans.use: For merchandise.

loans.name: Jorge Fabian

texts.es:
Jorge de 29 años, es taxista informal, vive al lado del estero de Guayaquil en una casa caña ubicada en la Perimetral de Guayaquil. 

Desde muy pequeño le gusto andar en vehículos particulares, pero con ayuda de su padre pudo comprar un carro para convertirlo en taxi informal y poder mantener a su esposa y dos hijos de 2 y 4 años. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h00pm recorriendo las calles de todo Guayaquil. Unos de los inconvenientes es trabajar en las noches debido al índice muy elevado de la delincuencia. 

Para seguir trabajando en su carro el quiere comprar unos repuesto y otra parte del préstamo utilizarla para comprar cemento, arena, piedras para construir mejor su casa ya que es de caña. En el futuro quiere tener su casa ubicada en otro lugar ya que viven en la orilla del estero y tiene miedo que pueda derrumbarse.
texts.en:
Jorge, 29, is an informal taxi driver.  He lives beside Guayaquil’s estuary in a cane stalk house located along Guayaquil’s beltway.

Since he was a little boy he enjoyed riding in private automobiles and with help from his father he was able to buy a car to turn into an informal taxi to support his wife and two children who are 2 and 4 years of age.  He currently works from 7am until 10pm driving along all of Guayaquil’s streets.  One of the inconveniences has to do with working at night because of the very high crime rate.

To continue working in his car he needs to buy some replacement parts and the other part of the loan will be used to buy cement, sand and gravel to improve his house’s construction because it’s made from cane stalks.  In the future he’d like to have a house located somewhere else because they currently live alongside the estuary and he fears it might collapse.

loans.use: For replacement parts, cement and sand.

loans.name: Casita Blanca Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Casita Blanca. . Está ubicado en el Estado de México.  El grupo está conformado por  10  integrantes. Patricia Rodríguez Avilés es  la presidenta  del grupo. Tiene 27 años, estudió hasta el 6 año de primaria, es comerciante y tiene en total 2 hijos  varones.  Ella tiene una ferretería que inició hace 4 años. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en mercancía. Sus clientes  son personas de las comunidades cercanas ya que cuenta con un amplio surtido.  Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente contenta. Quiere este crédito para poder tener todo lo que en su momento le piden. También espera en un futuro poder hacer algo en su casa pues actualmente se encuentra en obra negra.
texts.en:
This group is called “Casita Blanca” (Little White House).  It is located in the State of México and is made up of 10 members.  Patricia Rodríguez Avilés, 27, is group President.  She studied up to 6th grade, is a merchant, and has two sons.

She has a hardware store that she started four years ago.  She is asking for a loan to invest in merchandise.  Her customers are people from nearby communities because she has a wide selection of stock items.

She is happy while asking for the loan.  She wants it in order to have everything available at the moment it’s requested.  She also hopes to be able to do some home improvements in the future because the house is currently in an unfinished state.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to better stock her business.

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: Luis Manuel tiene su negocio que es la venta de CD y DVD hace más de 4 años que tiene esta actividad. Por lo que siempre está buscando la forma de mejorar sus ingresos, el mayor desafío que atraviesa es que hay mucha competencia ya que hay muchas personas que se dedican a este negocio, por lo que él se esmera en ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes para que siempre sigan llegando a buscar sus productos. Este crédito es para la compra de CD y DVD que sus clientes le solicitan ya que tiene bastantes pedidos.
texts.en:
Luis Manuel has had a CD and DVD sales business for over 4 years.  He is always looking for ways to improve his income.  The greatest challenge he faces is that there is a lot of competition since many people are in the same line of work.  Because of this he strives to provide good customer service so that they will continue to seek out his products.

This loan is to buy CDs and DVDs that his customers request since he has quite a few pending orders.

loans.use: To buy CDs and DVDs.

loans.name: Yuryi

texts.en:
Yuryi is a married father with a five-year-old child. Yuryi makes and sells ceremonial items in his home town. He has been in this business for six years. His turnover capital is about 30,000 Grivnas and his net profit exceeds 5,000 Grivnas a month. One of the specific characteristics of his business is a high turnaround of inventory.

Yuryi is very focused and determined. He is grateful for the loans he has received from “Nadiya Ukraine”, which have helped the expansion of his business. This time, Yuryi is requesting a loan of 11,000 Grivnas to purchase additional raw materials to manufacture funeral wreaths, e.g. fake flowers, wire and ribbons. The loan will be beneficial for Yuryi’s business by keeping it competitive and promoting further growth so it will continue to provide necessary income for his family.

loans.use: To purchase materials for funeral wreaths

loans.name: 10 Estrellitas Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la Casa de Mirna R. un integrante del grupo 10 Estrellitas, que está ubicado en la ciudad de Orizaba en el Estado de Veracruz en México. Se ve a la señora Mirna junto alas demás integrantes del grupo en la foto. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de temporada que inicio hace 10 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar suéteres, abrigos, cobertores, y más ropa para vender esta temporada. Sus clientes la consideran una persona honesta y responsable en la cual se puede confiar. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente contenta y muy satisfecha. Tiene  40 años, estudio hasta la carrera comercial, es casada y tiene en total 3 hijos: 1 mujer y 2 varones. Quiere este crédito para comprar la ropa de temporada para vender. También espera poder hacer crecer su clientela y con esto incrementar sus ventas para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This photo was taken at Mirna R.’s house, one of the members of the “10 Estrellitas” (10 Little Stars) group, located in Orizaba, Veracruz, México.  One can see Mirna with the other group members in the photo.

She has sold seasonal clothing for the last 10 years.  She is asking for the loan to buy sweaters, coats, comforters and other clothes to sell this season.  Her customers consider her to be an honest and responsible person that they can trust.

She feels very happy and satisfied while requesting the loan.  She is 40 years old and studied a commercial career.  She’s married and has three children, one girl and two boys.

She wants the loan to buy seasonal clothes to sell.  She also hopes to increase her customer base so that sales will increase thus improving her income.

loans.use: To buy winter clothes.

loans.name: Josefa Bernarda

texts.es: Josefa Bernarda tiene 58 años, su actividad es la venta y elaboración de comida. Hace más de 6 años que tiene este negocio, inicio porque necesitaba tener una fuente de ingresos que le generara ingresos necesarios y así proporcionarles a sus 3 hijos lo necesario. Uno de sus mayores desafíos es que tiene que realizar la elaboración de sus diferentes comidas para que sus clientes no tengan que esperar mucho tiempo. El destino del financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, verduras, jugos y gaseosas.
texts.en:
Josefa Bernarda, 58, sells food.  She has had the business for over 6 years.  She started it because she needed a source of income to provide for her three children.  

One of the greatest challenges she faces is to prepare the different dishes so that her customers don’t have to wait too long.

The loan will be used to buy basic grains, vegetables, juices and soft drinks.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, vegetables, juices and soft drinks.

loans.name: Alma Nubia

texts.es: Alma Nubia se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 6 años, ella se dedica a este negocio. Ella ofrece los diferentes productos a los clientes que encuentra pues sale  todos los días de manera ambulante lo que sus clientes le solicitan son ropa en general, ya que se acercan muy buenas temporadas y quiere surtir su inventario para obtener más clientes. Así invertirá el crédito en la compra de toallas, sabanas, cremas perfumes y ropa. Ella tiene las metas de establecer su negocio en un lugar donde transiten muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Alma Nubia has sold general merchandise for over 6 years.  She offers the items to customers she finds as she goes out every day to sell in an itinerant fashion.  What her customers request is clothing because good seasons are approaching and she wants to stock her inventory in order to get more customers.

She will, therefore, use the loan to buy towels, sheets, creams, perfumes and clothes.  Her goal is to establish her business someplace where many customers pass by.

loans.use: To buy towels, sheets, creams, perfumes and clothes.

loans.name: Marcelina Antonio

texts.pt:
Marcelina Antônio S. nasceu no Distrito de Massinga, Província de Inhambane, sul de Moçambique casada e mãe de 2 filhos de 9 e 12 anos de idade, todos vão a Escola. Fez somente 3ª classe não continuou devido a guerra de desestabilização que assolou o pais durante 16 anos. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais enviando algum valor monetário para as despesas de casa.

Saiu de Massinga para Maputo a procura de emprego e veio sozinha. Tem um negócio próprio de venda de vários produtos de consumo ha mais de 13 anos. Não tem empregados e consegue um rendimento de cerca de 4.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa algum na sua conta bancaria.

Ja teve empréstimos em outros bancos e decidiu não continuar, conheceu a Hluvuku através de amiga que também é cliente da instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 12.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar produto (bolachas, doces, arroz, farinha, óleo, caldo e outros) para aumentar a quantidade de seu stock.

O seu maior sonho é terminar a construção da sua casa. Esta confiante que vai pagar antes do tempo e pedir outro crédito para poder realizar seu sonho.
texts.en:
Marcelina Antônio S. was born in Massinga District, Inhambane Province in southern Mozambique.  She is married and has two children aged 9 and 12.  Both of them go to school.  Marcelina only completed third grade; she did not continue in school because of the civil war that ravaged the country for 16 years.  She lives in her own house with her family and supports her parents by sending them some money for household expenses.

Marcelina left Massinga to move to Maputo alone in search of a job.  For more than 13 years she has had her own business selling various consumer products.  She has no employees and earns around 4,000 meticais per month, which she uses for household expenses.  Marcelina also manages to save some money in her bank account.

She has had loans from other banks and decided not to continue with them.  She learned about Hluvuku through a friend who is also a customer of this institution.  This is her second loan with Hluvuku.  Marcelina is asking for 12,000 meticais to buy products (crackers, sweets, rice, flour, oil, broth, etc.) to increase her inventory.

Her greatest dream is to finish building her house.  She is confident that she will pay ahead of time and ask for another loan so she can make her dream come true.

loans.use: Buy products (crackers, sweets, rice, flour, oil, broth and other items)

loans.name: Janet

texts.es: Janet, de 36 años, es una madre de familia jovial y amante del negocio, vive en casa de sus suegros, junto con su esposo y sus 3 hijos. Todos los días, recorre las calles de su distrito con catálogo en mano, ofreciendo los diversos productos de belleza. Por otro lado, cuando es temporada de algún evento o fiesta que se celebra en la ciudad, ella aprovecha para vender algunos productos; es el caso del mes morado, en donde vendió turrones, postre limeño, que por medio de pedidos pudo obtener ganancias extras. Es una vendedora muy convincente, motivo por el cual todo lo que vende le sale y se ve forzado a  suministrarse de más productos. Siente que su negocio es muy rentable, ya que gracias a ello puede ayudar a su esposo en cubrir los gastos del hogar, además  cuenta con el  apoyo de sus suegros, en el cuidado de su hijo. Es por esta confianza que trabaja duro y motivada en salir adelante, siempre brindando un trato amable a sus clientes. Con el tiempo, anhela vender ropa o una tienda de disfraces. Es su 16avo crédito con MFP y sabe que tiene que pagar puntualmente sus cuotas y esta dispuesta hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable, motivo por el cual la estiman mucho. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más productos de belleza, para abastecer los pedidos pendientes que tiene.
texts.en: Janet, 36 years old, is the mother of a happy family and the happy owner of the business. She lives in her in-laws' home, along with her husband and three children. Every day, she goes up and down the streets in her district with her catalog in hand, peddling an array of beauty products. Also, when it's the season for a holiday or festival that her city celebrates, she takes advantage of the time to sell some products; this is the case for Mes Morado (Purple Month), when she sold nougat candies, a dessert from Lima, and through these sales was able to get extra revenue. She is a very convincing saleswoman and is motivated by the fact that everything she sells leaves her, which forces her to supply herself with more products. She feels her business is very profitable, and thanks to that she is able to help her husband cover household expenses, besides, she counts on her in-laws' support for caring for her son. It is because of this confidence that she works hard and is motivated to succeed, always giving her customers friendly service. In time, she hopes to sell clothes or have a store for dress clothes. This is her 16th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she knows that she has to make her payments on time, and she is ready to do so. In her communal bank she is a very responsible member, motivated by the fact that they respect her greatly. With the loan that she is requesting, she will buy more beauty products so she can fill the pending orders she has.

loans.use: Stock up on beauty products to fill pending orders from her customers

loans.name: Socorro

texts.es: Socorro tiene 58 años, su actividad es la venta de comida. Hace más de 17 años que tiene este negocio. Sus inicios se dan por inicios propios, ella siempre ha buscado la forma de trabajar y mejorar sus ingresos. Todos los días se levanta temprano para realizar la elaboración de sus comidas como gallo pinto, arroz, pollo, carnes, maduro, queso frito entre otros. La mayoría de sus clientes siempre llegan a buscar la gran variedad de comidas que ofrece. Socorro desea este crédito para la compra de arroz, pollo, carnes, verduras y granos básicos.
texts.en: Socorro is 58 years old.  Her business is selling food.  She has had her business for more than 17 years.  She started the business on her own, as she has always looked for ways to work and improve her earnings.  She gets up early every day to make the food she sells, like "gallo pinto" (a local dish of rice and beans), rice, chicken, meats, plantains, fried cheese and other items.  The majority of her customers come to her because of the large variety of food she offers.  Socorro wants this loan to purchase rice, chicken, meats, vegetables and basic grains.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Cacilda

texts.pt:
Cacilda N. nasceu na cidade de Maputo, Província de mesmo nome, sul de Moçambique divorciada e mãe de 1 filho de 22 anos de idade e já se encontra a trabalhar. Fez 6ª classe não continuou devido a falta de condições financeiras. Vive na casa própria com o seu filho e não sustenta mais ninguém.

Nunca saiu da sua cidade natal sempre viveu com a sua família em Maputo. Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade no quintal da sua casa e faz esta atividade ha muitos anos. Não tem empregados e consegue um rendimento de cerca de 5.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa algum na sua conta bancaria.

Nunca teve empréstimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de amigos que também são clientes da instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 12.600.00mt com o qual pretende comprar produto (arroz, farinha, óleo, caldo e outros) para aumentar a quantidade de seu stock.

O seu maior sonho é construir uma mercearia ainda melhor na sua própria casa. Esta confiante que vai pagar antes do tempo e pedir outro crédito para poder realizar seu sonho.
texts.en:
Cacilda N. was born in Maputo City, Maputo Province in southern Mozambique.  She is divorced and has a 22-year-old son who is now working.  Cacilda finished sixth grade but did not continue school because of financial difficulties.  She lives in her own house with her son and does not support anyone else.

She never left her hometown, but always lived with her family in Maputo. For many years Cacilda has had her own business selling staple goods in the yard of her house.  She has no employees and earns around 5,000 meticais per month, which she uses for household expenses.  She also saves some money in her bank account.

Cacilda never had loans from other banks.  She learned about Hluvuku through friends who are also customers of this institution.  This is her second loan, and she is asking for 12,600 meticais to buy products (rice, flour, oil, broth and other items) to increase her inventory.

Her greatest dream is to build a better grocery store in her house.  She is confident that she will pay ahead of time and ask for another loan to make her dream come true.

loans.use: Buy products (rice, flour, oil, broth, etc.)

loans.name: Maria Irela

texts.es: Maria Irela tiene 7 años de obtener este negocio que es la compra y destace de cerdos. Ella es una mujer muy responsable y disfruta de su actividad ya que tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo. Este negocio inicio por su Mama quien le enseño este negocio, ya que ella necesitaba un medio de vida para mantener a su hijo. Ella siempre está buscando la forma de mejorar por lo que es necesario obtener nuevos clientes. El crédito es para la compra de cerdos ya que ahorita tiene buenas propuestas.
texts.en: Maria Irela obtained a business of purchasing and butchering pigs 7 years ago.  She is a responsible woman who is happy to have her business since has a young son to take care of.  The business was started by her mother, who taught Irela the business because she needed a way to support her son.  Irela is always looking for ways to improve because she needs to get new customers.  The loan is for purchasing more pigs, since she currently has some good leads.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mujeres Audaces Group

texts.es: Esta  foto fue tomada en el negocio de la Sra. Gloria J. C., integrante  del grupo “Mujeres Audaces” que está ubicado en  Puebla, en México. En la foto podemos apreciar el local y parte de los abarrotes que la señora se dedica a vender; ella tiene 6 años con su negocio. Sus clientes dicen surtirse de productos básicos con doña Gloria porque están más accesibles que en otras tiendas, la clienta se siente contenta con su  préstamo ya que le agrada la idea de que alguien confíe en ella  y sus compañeras. Ella tiene 38 años, solo tuvo la oportunidad de cursar hasta la primaria, pero eso no le impidió salir adelante, es madre de 3 hijos; dos mujeres y un varón, con el crédito ella piensa  seguir invirtiendo en su negocio de abarrotes e incrementar el numero de clientes, así como de mercancía, tiene la firme idea de ampliar su casa así se sentiría feliz de estar generando mas patrimonio para ella y su familia, de igual manera proporcionarles estudios a sus hijos para que terminen una C. y tengan mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en: This picture was taken in front Sra. Gloria J. C.'s store.  She is a member of the communal bank “Mujeres Audaces” (Bold Women), which is located in Puebla, México. In the photograph, you can see her business as well as some of the groceries that doña Gloria makes her living selling.  She has run her business for 6 years.  Her customers say that they purchase basic goods from doña Gloria because hers are more accessible than in other stores.  Doña Gloria is happy with her loan and is pleased that someone trusts in her and in her companions.  She is 38 years old, and although she only had the opportunity to attend elementary school, it hasn't prevented her from getting ahead.  She is the mother of 3 children, two girls and one boy.  With the loan, she plans to continue investing in her grocery store and increasing her number of customers as well as her merchandise.  She is firm in her plans to expand her house; she would feel happy about generating more wealth for herself and for her family.  She also plans to provide an education for her children, so that they can get a degree and have more opportunities in life.

loans.use: To invest in her business.

loans.name: Celsa Francisca

texts.es: Celsa Francisca es una mujer que tiene muchos clientes y siempre llegan a solicitarle diferentes prendas de vestir. Hace más de 25 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy difícil lograr obtener este medio de vida. Ella dio inicio con muy poco capital, pues es muy importante es por su familia la razón por la que se preocupa por mejorar su condiciones de vida todos los días sabe que tiene que levantarse temprano para realizar los diferentes encargo que tiene pendiente de realizar. Este crédito es para la compra de tela, agujas, tijera, hilos, entre otras cosas. Sueña con mejorar la calidad de sus prendas.
texts.en: Celsa Francisca has a lot of customers who come to order different clothes from her.  She has been in this business for 25 years and it hasn't been easy.  She started off with very little capital but her business is very important to her as every day she worries about improving her family's standard of living.  She has to get up early to carry out the different tasks that she has pending.  This loan will be used to buy fabric, needles, scissors, thread, etc.  She dreams of improving the quality of the clothes that she offers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José Santos es un hombre muy responsable y disfruta de su negocio que es el servicio de vulcanización y soldadura. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio. Este medio de vida lo aprendió porque anteriormente él vivía en costa rica, pero debido a que su familia estaba en Nicaragua tuvo que venir y con fondos propios estableció su propio negocio, que está ubicado  en el sector número 8 del puente de Villanueva 300 metros al este. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima como maquinarias para reparar llantas, compra de llantas, herramientas entre otras cosas.
texts.en: José Santos is a responsible man who enjoys working in his tire repair and welding business.  He has had this business for more than 5 years.  He used to live in Costa Rica but because his family were in Nicaragua he came to live there and used his own funds to set up his own business.  He is requesting this loan to buy raw material such as machinery to repair tires, tires, equipment, etc.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Armando Lorenco

texts.pt:
Armando Lourenço L. nasceu no Distrito de Manjacaze, Província de Gaza, sul de Moçambique casado e pai de filhos já maiores de idade. Fez somente 4ª classe não continuou devido a falta de condições financeiras. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 netos que vivem com ele.

Saiu de Manjacaze para Maputo em missão de serviço, nessa altura veio sozinho. Tem um negócio próprio de venda de refeições e bebidas ha mais de 20 anos, não tem empregados e consegue um rendimento de cerca de 5.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa algum na sua conta bancaria.

Ja teve empréstimos em outros bancos (PROCREDIT), conheceu a Hluvuku através de sua vizinha que também é cliente da instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar produtos (cerveja, refrescos, vinho, ovos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade de seu stock.

O seu maior sonho é construir uma mercearia. Esta confiante que vai pagar antes do tempo e pedir outro crédito para poder realizar seu sonho.
texts.en:
Armando Lourenço L. was born in Manjacaze District, Gaza Province in southern Mozambique.  He is married and has adult children.  Armando only finished fourth grade and did not continue school because of financial difficulties.  He lives in his own house with his family and supports two grandchildren who live with him.

He left Manjacaze to go to Maputo on a work assignment, and at that time he came alone.  For more than 20 years he has had his own business selling meals and drinks.  He has no employees and earns about 5,000 meticais per month, which he uses for household expenses.  He also saves some money in his bank account.

Armando had loans before with other banks (ProCredit).  He learned about Hluvuku through his neighbor, who is also a customer of this institution.  This is Armando's first loan with Hluvuku.  He is asking for 15,000 meticais to buy products (beer, soft drinks, wine, eggs and other items) to increase the amount of stock he has.

His greatest dream is to build a grocery store.  Armando is confident that he will pay off the loan ahead of time and ask for another to make his dream come true.

loans.use: Buy products (beer, soft drinks, wine, eggs, etc.)

loans.name: Junielka Del Rosario

texts.es: Junielka Del Rosario es una joven muy emprendedora que se encuentra muy feliz con su negocio. Hace más de 6 años que tiene este negocio, que es la venta de calzado, ropa y lotería. Sus inicios se dan porque su Mama inicio con este negocio y así con el paso del tiempo fue enseñando a Junielka para que aprendiera este oficio que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Este crédito es la compra de ropa nueva, calzado y raspaditas. Desea llegar a establecer su negocio en su vivienda en donde es más rentable.
texts.en: Junielka Del Rosario is a very enterprising young woman who is very happy with her business.  She has had her business in which she sells footwear, clothes and lottery tickets for more than 6 years.  She started in this business because her mom set it up and, over time, taught Junielka the trade.  It is her main source of income.  This loan will be used to buy new clothes, footwear and scratchcards.  She hopes to eventually set her business up in her home where it is more profitable.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Juan Felipe

texts.es: Juan Felipe tiene 44 años su actividad es la venta de granos básicos. Hace más de 18 años que tiene su negocio. Tiene 1 hijo de 18 años a su cargo, Juan tiene ubicado su negocio en el mercado, en donde todos los días tiene que llegar a vender sus productos que ofrece arroz, frijoles, aceite, maíz, concentrado entre otros. El se levanta temprano desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, Juan se va tarde para lograr obtener más ganancias. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de materia prima necesaria en su negocio.
texts.en: Juan Felipe is 44 years old, and has a business selling staple grains.  He has had this business for more than 18 years.  He has a son who is 18 who he supports.  Juan's business is located in the market where he sells his products every day, including rice, beans, cooking oil, corn extract and other items.  He gets up early and works from 7am until 9 at night.  Juan works late so that he can get higher earnings.  The loan he requests is to buy supplies for his business.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Oscar Manuel

texts.es: Oscar Manuel tiene 30 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 2 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy gratificante, esta no es la primera vez que solicita crédito y todo lo que ha logrado es por medio de financiamientos es que ha mejorado. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra materia prima como sabanas, toallas, perfumes, cremas y ropa en general. El sueño de de Oscar es agrandar su negocio y establecerse en el mercado en donde todos los días asisten muchos clientes.
texts.en: Oscar Manuel is 30 years old.  He works selling general merchandise.  He has had this business for more than 2 years and it has been very rewarding.  This is not the first time that he has requested a loan and all that he has achieved has been as a result of the loans which have helped him to improve.  He is requesting this loan so that he can buy supplies such as sheets, towels, perfume, creams and clothes.  Oscar's dream is to expand his business and set up in the market where there are many customers every day.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Osiris Mileyda

texts.es: Osiris tiene 33 años, Ella se dedica a la venta de golosinas, hace más de 10 años que se dedica a esta humilde actividad. Sus inicios se dan con capital propio, siempre le ha gustado ser una persona muy luchadora y que disfruta de su negocio debido al esfuerzo que realiza todos los días. La difícil situación que ha enfrentado ya que alguna veces que no vende no puede comer, su negocio está ubicado en su vivienda. El crédito es para la compra de bombones, caramelos, chocolate y otros productos.
texts.en: Osiris is 33 years old.  She has a business selling sweets.  She has been in this humble business for more than 10 years.  She started out with her own capital.  She has always been a fighter and she enjoys her business owing to the effort that she puts in every day.  The difficult situation which she has sometimes faced is that if she hasn't managed to sell, she hasn't been able to eat.  Her business is located in her home.  This loan will be used to buy candies, sweets, chocolate and other products.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mercedes Yanec

texts.es: Mercedes Yanec tiene 32 años, su actividad es la venta de productos varios. Hace más de 15 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy importante para ella mantenerlo, pues la mayoría de sus clientes siempre llegan a buscar los frijoles cosidos, productos lácteos, y tortillas, que son muy importantes pues son productos que diariamente las familias de escasos recursos solicitan. El motivo de este crédito es para la compra frijoles, leña y productos lácteos. Sueña con terminar de construir su vivienda y agrandar su negocio.
texts.en: Mercedes Yanec is 32 years old.  She has a business selling various products.  She has had this business for more than 15 years.  It has been very important to her to maintain it since most of her clients are always looking for baked beans, dairy products and tortillas.  These are very important since they are products that families of limited means ask for every day.  This loan will be used to buy beans, firewood and dairy products.  Mercedes dreams of being able to finish building her house and expand her business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Carlos Mnauel

texts.es: Carlos Manuel tiene 28 años, su actividad económica es la venta de bananos y naranjas. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que es una persona muy responsable ya que tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo, el siempre está buscando la forma de mejorar sus ingresos pues para él es muy importante proporcionarle a su hijo alimento, vestimenta y estudios. Es por esto que solicita este crédito con el fin de incrementar su inventario como frutas, banano y naranjas.
texts.en:
Carlos Manuel is 28 years old and his economic activity is selling bananas and oranges.  For more than 3 years he has had this business and he is a very responsible person who has 1 minor child in his charge.  Carlos is always looking for a way to improve his income, since it is very important to provide his child with food, clothing and schooling.

This is why he is soliciting this loan, for the purpose of increasing his inventory of fruit, especially bananas and oranges.

loans.use: INCREASING HIS INVENTORY OF FRUITS, BANANAS, AND ORANGES

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth, de 34 años, es una madre amorosa en su hogar, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Desde hace 6 años Ruth esta encargada de administrar su carro, mientras es alquilado por un chofer que se encarga del vehículo para trabajar de taxista. Desde entonces y todas las mañanas, verifica las condiciones en que se encuentra el vehiculo antes de que salga a trabajar, para evitar algún tipo de inconveniente mientras es conducido. En ocasiones su esposo también la ayuda en el negocio, se siente muy contenta por este trabajo le esta generando buenas utilidades, pese además que existen accidentes o asaltos, pero confía que todo le saldrá bien. En adelante, desea comprarse un motocarro, para que pueda también alquilarlo y generarse más ingresos. Es su 16avo crédito con MFP, por lo que asegura que este crédito le será muy útil para reparar su carro. Con el crédito que solicita, mandará a planchar la capota de su carro, para que pueda continuar trabajando.
texts.en: Ruth is 34 years old.  She is a loving mother who lives in her own home with her husband and 2 children.  For 6 years Ruth has handled the management of her car which she hires out to a driver who uses it to work as a taxi driver.  Every morning she checks the condition of the vehicle before it goes out to work so that there will be no problems while it is being driven.  Her husband sometimes helps her with the business.  She is very happy with this work which is providing her with good profits.  There are sometimes accidents or robberies but she believes that everything will turn out well.  In the future she would like to buy a 'motocarro' (motorcycle taxi) which she can also hire out and make more income.  This is her 16th loan from MFP and she assures us that this loan will be very useful for her as she will be able to repair her car.  She will use the loan to send the car to have its top straightened out so that she can continue working.

loans.use: To send her car to have its top straightened out so that she can continue hiring it out

loans.name: Luis

texts.en:
Luis has been working in the delivery industry for over seven years. His success and business savvy have helped him form relationships with some of the best-known bakeries in the New York City area. These relationships mean that starting very early in the morning, his day continues late into the afternoon delivering everything from muffins to cakes for various restaurants and cafes in the New York area.

This is Luis’s third loan with ACCION USA. His previous loan was used to insulate his van so that his baked goods would survive better in the summer heat. Since his previous loan, he has purchased a new van and will use this loan to insulate this van in order to provide the freshest pastries to his clientele. 

Luis hopes to continue to expand his contracts beyond his current six and gain more business with the City’s best bakeries. The continued growth of his business means that he has been better able to support his family and, more importantly, place his son in good schools. 

The staff at ACCION USA is particularly excited about watching Luis’s business grow because the office is a frequent client of his service!

loans.use: To insulate a new delievry van

loans.name: Nora Azucena

texts.es: Nora Azucena tiene 30 años, ella se dedica a una pulpería. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio. Su pulpería está localizada en su vivienda tiene una gran variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes, Realiza su trabajo sola para poder ayudar con los gastos familiares, trabaja desde muy temprano ofreciendo los productos se levanta temprano desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Con el préstamo quiere comprar productos como golosinas, refrescos, detergentes, pan y granos básicos. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y asegurar el estudio de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Nora Azucena, 30, earns a living with a general goods store, a business she has had for more than four years. Her store is located in her home and she has a great variety of products to offer her customers. She works alone to be able to help with the family expenses. She opens shop and begins working very early. She gets up early and works from 7 in the morning until 9 at night. 

With the loan she wants to buy products such as candies, drinks, detergents, bread and basic foodstuffs. In the future she wants to finish building her house and see that her children are able to complete their studies.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Francisca Enriqueta

texts.es: Francisca Enriqueta tiene 42 años, su actividad es brindar el negocio de molino. Hace más de 30 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que no ha sido fácil sufragar los gastos de su hogar, ella tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo que como Madre soltera lucha todos los días por él. Este negocio inicio como herencia de su Mama ya que ofrecía un buen servicio a la mayoría de sus clientes. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de motor nuevo y para la reparación de uno de los motores. Sueña con realizar la compra de mas equipo modernos.
texts.en:
Francisca Enriqueta is 42 years old. As her business she provides milling services. She has had this business for more than 30 years and it has not been easy covering her household expenses. She has one minor child in her care and as a single Mother struggles every day on his behalf. This business began as an inheritance from her Mom since she offered a good service to the majority of her customers. 

The purpose of the loan is to purchase a new motor and to repair one of the motors. She dreams of being able to purchase more modern equipment.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Bokk Diom Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité BOKK DIOM est créé le 28 mars 2008. Il est composé de 08 femmes qui sont toutes issues du même quartier. Elles ont organisé leur groupe par voisinage et par lien de parenté. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de MONTAGNE NORD2

Madame Fatou Diop N. debout à droite de la photo est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 66 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 12 enfants. 

Elle fait de l'embouche ovine depuis qu'elle ne soit membre du Banc Villageois

Avec son crédit elle va acheter 3 bœufs et de l'aliment de bétail afin d'engraisser les bêtes et les revendre au bout de  5 mois.

son objectif est de renforcer son capital afin d'étendre son activité. Elle participe aussi à la prise en charge financière de la famille.
texts.en:
The BOKK DIOM solidarity group was created March 28, 2008. It consists of eight women from the same neighborhood. They came together as neighbors and through kinship. The group is part of the Banc Villageois MONTAGNE NORD2.

Mrs. Fatou Diop N., standing at the right of the photo, is the head of the group. She is 66 years old, married, and the mother of twelve children.

She has been involved in the activity of sheep fattening ever since the group joined the Banc Villageois. 

With her loan, she plans to buy three oxen and some cattle feed to fatten the animals and sell them five months later.

Her goal is to strengthen her working capital to expand her business. She also participates in the financial support of the family.

loans.use: To buy oxen

loans.name: German Jose

texts.es: Germán José tiene 28 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de asistencia médica. Hace más de 2 años, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. el inicio este negocio porque le gustaba este tipo de carrera, por lo que se empeño mucho y decidió sacrificar muchas cosas para finalizar sus estudios y dedicarse a lo que es su medio de vida. El brinda asistencia médica al público en general por lo que sus pacientes llegan a su vivienda en donde está ubicado su negocio. Este crédito está destinado para la compra de herramientas de trabajo medicinales para mejorar la atención con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Germán José is 28 years of age. His business is providing medical care which he has done for more than two years. He has two minor children in his care. He began this business because this type of career appealed to him. Therefore he worked very hard and made the decision to sacrifice many things to be able to complete his studies and go to work making a living in the field. He offers medical care to the general public and his patients come to his living quarters, which is where his business is located. 

This loan will be used for purchasing tools of the medical trade in order to improve service to his customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Assia Bibe Aida

texts.pt:
Assia Bibe Aida I. conseguiu comprar o material acordado embora não na totalidade devido ao elevado custo de material, mas conseguiu algum auxílio para poder concretizar o seu objectivo. 

Conseguiu pagar o valor sem problemas, embora com alguns atrasos devido ao seu vencimento que saía tarde e sendo a única fonte de rendimento devia esperar ate o vencimento sair. A sua obra esta neste momento numa fase muita avancada,com o presente emprestimo no valor de 15.000.00mt pretende comprar material de construcao (cimento, pedra, legalizacao do terreno e outros)para dar continuidade com a sua obra. 

Houve certas mudanças na sua vida, já esta a concluir uma casa própria e no futuro pretende solicitar mais empréstimos para construir a sua casa.
texts.en:
Assia Bibe Aida I. was able to buy the material expected although not all of it, due to the high price of the material, but she was able to get some help to accomplish her objective.

She was able to pay the price without problem, with some delays due to delays on her salary and because she is the only source of income she had to wait until she got paid in order to pay off the materials. Her construction is now very advanced, with the current loan for 15,000mt she expect to buy construction material (cement, stone, to legalize her land, among others) to keep on going the construction.

She is getting close to finish building her house and expects to request another loan to fulfill this.

loans.use: buy construction material (cement, stone, to legalize her land, among others)

loans.name: Sop Sën Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le Groupe de Solidarité SOP SËN FALLOU est créé le 28 mars 2008. Il est composé de 09 femmes qui sont toutes issues du même quartier. Elles se sont organisées par voisinage et affinité. Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois de MONTAGNE NORD 2.

Madame Rokhaya S. à droite de la photo est responsable du groupe de solidarité. Elle est âgée de 54 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Elle a aussi la charge d'un neveu et d'une nièce.

Elle fait depuis 5 ans un petit commerce de thioub. Elle est aussi vendeuse de poulets locaux. 

Avec son nouveau crédit elle va augmenter son niveau d'approvisionnement pour accroitre ses revenus financiers

Son objectif est de participer à la prise en charge de la nourriture, de la santé, de la scolarisation et de l'habillement de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The solidarity group SOP SËN FALLOU was created on March 28, 2008.  It is composed of 9 women who come from the same neighborhood.   They are organized according to where they live and by common interest. The group are members the Banc Villageios of Montagne Nord 2.

Madame Rokhaya S., to the right in the picture, is the leader of the solidarity group.  She is 54 years old and the mother of four children.  She also takes care of a nephew and a niece.  

For five years, she has been in the business of selling thioub (dyed cloth).  She also sells local chickens. 

With her new loan she plans to increase her stocks so that she can increase her revenue.  

Her goal is to provide food, health care, education, and clothing to her children.

loans.use: To develop and promote their small businesses

loans.name: Carlos Fabiao

texts.pt:
Carlos Fabiao M. nasceu no Distrito de Macie, Província de Gaza, sul de Moçambique casado e pai de 8 filhos cujas idades não se lembra e todos vão a Escola. Fez somente 2ª classe não continuou porque tinha que ajudar na pastagem do gado familiar. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua segunda esposa que se encontra na província de gaza enviando algum valor para as despesas de casa.

Saiu de Gaza para Maputo a procura de emprego e veio sozinho. Trabalha numa empresa agrícola como operador Agrícola ha mais de 4 anos, recebe um salario de 1.690.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda com ajuda da esposa que faz negócio consegue poupar algum através de Xitique (sistema tradicional de poupança rotativa).

Nunca teve empréstimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de colegas que também são clientes da instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, ferro e outros) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa.

O seu maior sonho é terminar a construção da sua casa. Esta confiante que vai pagar antes do tempo e pedir outro credito.


























Carlos Fabiao M. nasceu no Distrito de Macie, Província de Gaza, sul de Moçambique casado e pai de 8 filhos cujas idades não se lembra e todos vão a Escola. Fez somente 2ª classe não continuou porque tinha que ajudar na pastagem do gado familiar. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua segunda esposa que se encontra na província de gaza enviando algum valor para as despesas de casa.

Saiu de Gaza para Maputo a procura de emprego e veio sozinho. Trabalha numa empresa agrícola como operador Agrícola ha mais de 4 anos, recebe um salario de 1.690.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda com ajuda da esposa que faz negócio consegue poupar algum através de Xitique (sistema tradicional de poupança rotativa).

Nunca teve empréstimos em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de colegas que também são clientes da instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, ferro e outros) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa.

O seu maior sonho é terminar a construção da sua casa. Esta confiante que vai pagar antes do tempo e pedir outro credito.
texts.en:
Carlos Fabiao M. was born in Macie District, Gaza Province in southern Mozambique.  He is married and has 8 children whose ages he does not remember; all the children go to school.  Carlos only finished second grade and did not continue because he had to help graze the family's cattle.  He lives in his own house with his family and supports his second wife, who lives in Gaza Province, by sending her some money for household expenses. 

Carlos left Gaza to move to Maputo looking for work, and he came alone.  He has worked for more than four years at an agricultural company as an agricultural operator.  He receives a salary of 1,690 meticais per month, which he uses for household expenses.  With the help of his wife, who runs a business, he is also able to save some money through Xitique (a traditional system of rotating savings).

He has never had loans from other banks.  Carlos learned about Hluvuku through co-workers who are also customers of this institution.  This is his first loan.  He is asking for 10,000 meticais to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, iron, and other items) to continue construction on his house.

His greatest dream is to finish building his house.  Carlos is confident he will pay off the loan ahead of time and ask for another loan.

loans.use: Construction materials (cement, sand, stone, iron, etc.)

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: El señor Luis es mecánico, vive en el barrio 30 de marzo de la zona radial 10, dedica a este rubro desde hace tres años, él es una persona joven y muy responsable, es el segundo crédito que solicita para comprar un gato hidráulico y mas herramientas como: Llaves, que necesita para equipar el taller, el vive en casa con sus padres y contribuye a la economía del hogar. Quiere agrandar su taller porque ha aumentado en estos meses sus clientes que requieren sus servicios,  esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Luis is a mechanic. He lives in the 30 de marzo neighborhood of radial zone 10, and has plied this trade for three years. He is a young and very responsible person.
