Cinthia  es una cliente antigua de la institución , puntual y responsable la señora se dedica  a la venta de ropa usada la cual la compra en fardos y los vende en la feria 16 de julio (en el alto), la señora también se dedica a la venta de laminas escolares las cuales las distribuye en las librerías de distintas zonas de la ciudad de La Paz, ella tiene dos hijitos pequeños que se encuentran en edad escolar con los cuales sube a la feria a vender los sacos y ternos, el crédito que solicita es para el mantenimiento de su movilidad y la compra de fardos de ropa para las fiestas de fin de año. Es una clienta bastante trabajadora,  y alegre, el dinero del crédito es para el arreglo de su movilidad ya que esta en mal estado y no  le permite llevar sus fardos de ropa a la venta, también es para compra de fardos de ropa.
texts.en: Cinthia is an old client of our institution.  She is punctual and responsible.  She works selling used clothes which she buys in bundles and sells in the '16 de Julio' market in El Alto.  She also sells educational laminated posters which she distributes to bookstores in different areas of the city of La Paz.  She has two small school-age children who she takes to the market with her to sell jackets and suits.  The loan which she is requesting is to provide maintenance for her vehicle and to buy bundles of clothes for the end-of-year festivities.  She is a hard-working and happy client of our institution.

loans.use: To invest in repairs to her vehicle and to purchase bundles of clothes

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela de 54 años, tiene una pequeña peluquería. Vive con sus tres hijos en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores. 

Empezó hace 16 años como estilista de puerta a puerta ya que se separo de su esposo y necesitaba dinero para mantener a sus tres hijos. Cuando reunió el dinero suficiente para su peluquería readecuo una parte de su casa para convertirla en el local de la peluquería. En la actualidad tiene en su casa su negocio y trabaja desde las 09h00am hasta las 19h00pm haciendo tratamientos de cabello, cortes, alisados, planchados etc. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar tratamientos, esmaltes y cremas para su peluquería. En el futuro quiere ampliar su casa para tener mas espacio para su peluquería.
texts.en:
Graciela is 54 years old.  She has a small hairdressing salon.  She lives with her three children in an urban area called Orquídeas (orchids) which is so named because when it was discovered they found many orchids and there is currently a park of these flowers there.

She started out 16 years ago as a stylist working door to door since she had separated from her husband and needed money to support her three children.  When she had gathered together sufficient money for her hairdressing salon she modified part of her home to convert it into her  premises.  She currently has her business in her house and works from 9.00am to 7.00pm doing hair treatments, hair cuts, hair straightenings etc.

She would like to use the loan to buy treatments, varnishes and creams for her salon.  In the future, she would like to extend her house so that she has more room for her salon.

loans.use: Treatments, varnishes, creams

loans.name: Catalino Facundo

texts.es:
El productor Catalino Facundo habita en la colonia Providencia del municipio de Nueva Guinea junto a su familia compuesta por su esposa Carmen Guzman, y sus hijos Marvin y Daysi, quienes le ayudan a las actividades de la finca. 

Esta solicitando 2do crédito para establecer pasto mejorado, lo que le permitiria comercializar y brindarle mejor cuido a su hato ganadero, pues así aseguraria la alimentación del ganado en tiempo de sequía, ya que mantendria su hato ganadero en buen desarrollo y le permitiria que obtengan un peso necesario a corto plazo. 

Don Catalino ademas establece cultivos de raices y tuberculos, se ha destacado por su gran responsabilidad en sus compromisos crediticios, trabajador, y honesto.
texts.en:
The producer Catalino Facundo lives in the Providence district of the New Guinea municipality. He lives together with his family, made up of his wife, Carmen Guzman, and their children Marvin and Daysi, who help them with farm work. 

He is asking for his 2nd loan to establish better grass, which will permit him to commercialize and to allow him to better care for his herd of livestock. In this way he could assure that the livestock would have food in times of draught. In this way he would maintain the herd in good development and it would allow the animals to maintain a necessary weight over the short term. Mr. Catalino is also establishing crops of roots and tubers. 

He has stood out for his responsibility in his loan repayments, his hard work, and his honesty.

loans.use: To plant grass

loans.name: Donald Fidencio

texts.es:
Donald Fidencio de 33 años de edad es soltero, es pequeño productor de la Comarca Villa Alvarez del municipio de Nueva Guinea, cuenta con el apoyo de su hemano que le ayuda en las labores del campo. 

Donald esta solicitando su 2do crédito con el objetivo de invertido en siembra de pasto mejorado,  que le permitira asegurar la alimentación del ganado en tiempo de verano y así mantener su hato ganadero con buen desarrollo y tener mayor peso del ganado y producción de leche.  

Su mayor sueño es poder incrementar su hato ganadero para que cuando forme su propia familia pueda brindarle buenas condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Donald Fidencio is 33 years old and single.  He is a small producer in the Villa Alvarez region in the town of Nueva Guinea.  He has the support of his brother who helps him with the field work.  

Donald is requesting his second loan so that he can invest in grass seed to improve his pasture.  This will allow him to insure that his cattle are fed in the summer season, that his herd will develop well, gain more weight and produce milk.  

His dream is to be able to increase his herd size so that when he has his own family he can give them a good quality life.

loans.use: To purchase grass seed to improve his pasture

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Maria Magdalena  de 58 años de edad es soltera, trabajó para el MINED como docente durante 20 años, pero actualmente esta jubilada y recibe mensualmente pension como maestra jubilada. 

Esta solicitando su 11vo credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda construyendo la cocina de su casa para mayor comodidad de su familia.Habita junto a sus 2 hijos los cuales son mayores y le apoyan con los gastos de la casa.  

La profesora Maria Magdalena expresa sentirse muy agradecida con AFODENIC ya que con los creditos poco a poco a ido mejorando su vivienda, y espera seguir contanto con el apoyo de esta institucion para seguir mejorando su casa ya que es el patrimonio de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria Magdalena is 58-year-old single woman who worked for MINED as a teacher for 20 years but has retired and is now receiving monthly pension. 

She is requesting her eleventh loan with the goal of improving her housing by constructing a kitchen for the greater comfort of her family. She lives with her two older children who provide support with household costs. 

Maria would like to express her great appreciation for AFODENIC since the loans have helped her improve her home little by little. She hopes to continue working with this institution in order to continue improving her house since it will become her children's.

loans.use: to build a kitchen

loans.name: Bushra's Group

texts.en:
Bushra is a talented lady. She not only fulfills her responsibilities as a housewife but also operates her business of selling cosmetics at home, which is working well. The income she earns allows her to pay off the school fees of her kids.  She has given birth to 5 children: 3 daughters and 2 sons. All of them are enrolled in a school and are getting their education by studying in different classes. 

Her husband, M. A., has a small restaurant through which he offers different and tasty food items and tea to his clients.  He has a good number of clients who prefer coming to his restaurant due to the taste and quality of his food.  She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. He will invest the loan to purchase items such as cooking oil, spices, tea, sugar and milk in bulk quantity to maintain the quality of his food items served to his clients.

Bushra is hopeful that her husband, who is operating this business for the past 20 years will successfully be able to further grow his business after this loan investment.  She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her fifth loan application. She knows her responsibilities as a loan user very well. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed a single meeting. 

Note: In the photo, the lady who holds a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Bushra.

loans.use: To buy required items for restaurant business.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “PACHA ILLAIRY ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jesusa;   la socia tiene 42 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de semillas fertilizantes, alquiler de terrenos, compra de ganados y agricultura, la socia apoya a su conyugue en tod lo referente a la agricultura y ganadería; pero la socia también está dedicada en estos últimos meses a la artesanía ella teje mantas y las lleva a vender al pueblo, la socia cuando no está apoyando a su conyugue teje como parte de distraerse y hace frazadas también.  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas y alquiler de terreno para su nueva siembra.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member is part of the PACHA ILLAIRY village bank, located in the Ocongate district of Quispicanchis in the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Jesusa: she 42 years old and has three children. She buys and sells fertilized seeds, rents land, buys cattle and agriculture, and supports her spouse with his agriculture and livestock. In the past couple of months she has also worked as an artisan, sewing blankets that she sells in the village. When she is not supporting her husband she sews as a way to distract herself. She is requesting this loan to invest it in the purchase of seeds and to rent the land for her new crop. 

This member appreciates and values this loan and promises to fulfill the repayment of her loan in the established timeframe.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and rent land for her crop

loans.name: Zainab's Group

texts.en:
Zainab has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband's business, who is a farmer by profession. He works in the field and grows different vegetables, wheat, and cotton, etc. 

Growing these items enable him to fulfill the needs of his customers and earn good profit on it.  With the loan, he will buy fertilizer & seeds to improve his business and to get better results from his work. 

Zainab lives with her family in Chichawatni, which is a small city located in Punjab Pakistan and is known for its agriculture industry.  She lives there in a 2-room brick house in the area named Gulistan colony. She came here after her marriage with A. A. 26 years ago. 

She is a housewife and does her household responsibilities by staying at home.   She has given birth to 4 sons and a daughter. Her daughter is studying in 4th class, while all of her sons are involved in different kind of works to contribute financially to the family.  

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In the previous loan year, she has built good credit behavior and never missed a single meeting.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer & seeds for farming business

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia forma parte del banco comunal “Esperanza y Fe” de la comuna de Independencia. Ella se dedica a la confección por encargo, desde cosas sencillas hasta vestidos de novia y de fiesta, desde hace 20 años. 
Con este préstamo comprará una máquina recta industrial y tela para hacer  un encargo de tutús (falda usada por las bailarinas de danza clásica). Ya tiene una de estas máquinas, pero por la gran cantidad de pedidos, tuvo que contratar a una persona para que le ayude. 
Su sueño es tener una máquina overlock, ya que le facilitaría más el trabajo de costura, lo que le permitiría seguir creciendo en su negocio y aportar al mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de su familia. Ella tiene 3 hijos de 21,16 y 10 años.
Para Patricia Fondo Esperanza ha sido un gran apoyo, ya que fue el único lugar en donde no le pidieron requisitos especiales que ella no pudiera cumplir. También ha aprendido a ser responsable y ha sido muy grato para ella compartir con sus compañeros de grupo.
Independencia es una de las 34 comunas que componen la ciudad de Santiago (capital de Chile), ubicada en el sector centro-norte. Se caracteriza por la presencia de edificios de mediana altura. Aquí se encuentra el Centro Cultural Indígena de Chile, entre otros 6 monumentos históricos de Chile.
texts.en:
Patricia is a member of “Esperanza y Fe” (Hope and Faith) communal bank in Independencia.  She has made clothes to order, everything from simple items to wedding gowns and party dresses for the last 20 years.

She will use this loan to buy a straight stitch industrial sewing machine and fabric to fill an order for tutus (skirt used by classical ballerinas).  She already has one of these machines but the large amount of orders has led to her hiring an employee to help her.

Her dream is to have an over lock sewing machine because it will make the sewing much easier which will allow the business to continue growing and contribute to her family’s improved quality of life.  She has three children who are 21, 16 and 10 years old.

Fondo Esperanza has been of great help to Patricia because it was the only place where she wasn’t asked for special requirements that she couldn’t fill.  She has also learned how to be responsible and she has enjoyed sharing with her fellow group members quite a bit.

Independencia is one of the 34 communes that make up the city of Santiago (capital of Chile).  It is located in the center-north sector and is noted for its medium size buildings.  The Chilean Indigenous Cultural Center as well as six other Chilean historical monuments is found here.

loans.use: For a straight stitch industrial sewing machine and for fabric.

loans.name: Olman

texts.es: Olman V. S., tiene la edad de 36  años, es casado, y tiene 5 hijos que son su mayor prioridad al igual que su esposa. El quiere compra una novilla para producir la leche para el consumo de su familia y además si se pudiera vender lo que sobra para tener un ingreso de más. Además, el cuenta con el terreno apto para este proyecto y la mantención de esa novilla. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no tenía problemas en su propiedad, pero si tiene el deseo de sea una finca productiva. También, el no   ha realizados otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El tiene el deseo de producir su propia leche para el consumo familiar y a la vez ir generando ganancias para brindarle una ayuda extra a su familia y tener mejores condiciones de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Olman V. S., 36, is married and has five children who are his first priority in life as well as his wife.  He wants to buy a young cow for milk production both for family consumption and also to sell whatever is left over for extra income.

In addition, he has a piece of property that is appropriate for this project and to support the cow.  He has been dedicated to his farm for several years and wants to see it grow.

This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He has no problems with his property but does hope to make it productive.  Also, he has not taken any loans out in state-owned banks but FUDECOSUR provided the loan with better terms and an interest rate that is much lower.  

His wish is to produce milk for his family’s consumption as well as generate profits that will be extra help for his family and to have better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a young cow.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE COYLLORITTI DE CCORAO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jorge; el tiene 65 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; el socio se dedica a la agricultura, el socio tiene un pequeño terreno de cultivo donde siembran maíz, cebada, papa y habas y después lo vende en el mercado de Huancaro en la ciudad de Cusco, el socio quiere mejorar sus tierras de cultivo. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y semillas para las tierras de cultivo.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Jorge, 65, is a member of the “SEÑOR DE COYLLORITTI DE CCORAO” communal bank located in Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

He is single and has a son.  He’s a farmer.  He has a small plot where he grows corn, barley, potatoes and lima beans which he sells in the Huanaco Market in the city of Cusco.  

He wants to improve his lands and is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers and seed for his fields.

He thanks all those who are part of his dream and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seed.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “PACHA ILLAIRY ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Paulino;   él tiene 33 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos,  El socio es natural de Ocongate,  Él socio trabajaba como  obrero en la carretera interoceánica,  y también es  gasfitero y realiza todo tipo de trabajos el socio es muy trabajador y solo tiene primaria completa, el desde muy joven se dedico a ayudar a sus padres para poder educar y alimentar a sus hermanos, el socio ahora solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de herramientas y también quiere comprar un terrenito para poder construir su casa. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar herramientas de construcción y ahorrar para comprar su terreno.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Paulino, 33, is a member of the “PACHA ILLAIRY” communal bank located in Ocongate district, Quispicanchis province, Cusco department.

He has a live-in partner and three children.  He is from Ocongate and works as a laborer on the Interoceanic Highway.  He is also a plumber and does all kinds of jobs; he is very hard working.  He only finished elementary school.  Since a very young age he helped his parents in order to feed and educate his younger siblings.  

He is asking for a loan to buy tools.  He also wants to buy a small piece of land to build his house.  He is asking for the loan to buy construction tools and to save up to buy his lot.

He is grateful for and values the loan granted and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy construction tools and to save up to buy a piece of land.

loans.name: Sadia

texts.fr: Elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle est revendeuse de pagnes  traditionnels et bazins . Elle compte dans cette activité 10 ans d’expérience. Elle contribue au menage et fait le commerce de pagnes et bazins.  Elle s’approvisionne au Burkina-Faso et revend à Lomé.Elle sollicile au près de WAGES un credit pour satisfaire plus de clients
texts.en: She is married and the mother of two. She resells traditional fabrics: colorful “pagnes” and damask-type “basins.” She has over 10 years of experience in this area. She contributes to the family budget by selling “pagnes” and “basins.” She stocks up in Burkina-Faso and resells in Lomé. She is seeking a loan from WAGES in order to be able to  have more customers.

loans.use: Purchasing and resale of traditional fabrics

loans.name: Kalsoom's Group

texts.en:
Kalsoom lives in Chichawatni which is a small city located in Punjab Pakistan and known for its agriculture industry. She lives there in a 3 room brick house with her family in the area named Gulistan Colony. She moved here a few years ago. She is married with M. A. and has 4 children.  

Her son operates a donkey cart for a transportation business. He provides loading services to his customers and earns income. Her 3 daughters stay at home and help her in her domestic chores. Kalsoom couldn’t provide them an education due to poor financial conditions. She is a very supportive lady, always ready to help her family in difficult time. She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son’s loading business. He will invest the loan by purchasing of a new donkey cart because the old cart has become worn and rotted in different areas.  The new cart will carry more load on it and provide better services to his customers. 

Kalsoom is confident that through this investment her son will keep continue his business and improves his earning. She is a new loan applicant of Asasah.  

Note: In the photo, the lady who has holds a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Kalsoom.

loans.use: To buy a new donkey cart for a transport business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For snacks, meats and rice.

loans.name: Pascuala

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “PACHA ILLAIRY ”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Pascuala;   la socia tiene 38 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos, la socia se dedica  a la artesanía la socia realiza trabajos en lana de alpaca, y lana de ovino; la socia compra lanas y las tiñe con productos vegetales, ella luego de elaborar las madejas de lana hace el tejido tomando un extremo de las lanas a una punta que luego irá entrelazando poco a poco haciendo figuras geométricas y variando los tonos de lanas. La socia requiere el préstamo para comprar lanas y poder realizar sus tejidos y elaborar mantas, frazadas y otros.

La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member is part of the “Pacha Illairy” communal bank. The communal bank is located in the Ocongate district that pertains to the Quispicanchis province and the region of Cusco. 

The member is Mrs. Pascuala. She is 38 years old, in a common law marriage and has 3 children. The member makes a living as an artisan, making items out of alpaca and sheep wool. She buys the wool and she tints them with vegetable products. In order to make the wool into yarn she weaves it, taking the end of the wool into a point. She will then enlace them little by little, making geometric figures and varying the tones of the wool. The member needs the loan to buy wool and to be able to make woven items and different types of blankets. 

The member thanks you and value the loan granted to her and in this same vein she promises to pay the amount in full in the established installments.

loans.use: The member needs the loan to buy wool to be able to make woven products and blankets.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto V. Chacón, tiene la edad de 36  años, es casado, vive con su esposa y tiene 3 hijos que son su mayor prioridad por el momento. El quiere comprar abonos y los herbicidas para la mantención del tiquizque y  la semilla del frijol para su posterior siembra. Además, el cuenta con el terreno apto para este proyecto con 3 manzanas de tiquizque sembradas y 4 hectáreas que quiere sembrar de frijol. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer y a su vez generar más ingresos. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no tiene problemas en su propiedad, pero si tiene el deseo de que sea una finca productiva. También, el no   ha realizados otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El tiene como metas generar  ganancias para su bienestar y darles una mayor calidad de vida a su familia, también a su vez ir generando el dinero para los pagos del préstamo y esperar que le quede un dinero adicional para las temporadas que no se cosecha o se produce en la tierra.
texts.en:
Roberto V. Chacón, 36, is married and lives with his wife and three children who are his greatest priority at the moment.  He wants to buy manure and herbicides to care for the tiquizque (starchy tuber) and for bean seed for subsequent planting.  He has a field that is appropriate for this project with three manzanas (Central American area measurement) planted with tiquizque and four hectares that he wants to plant with beans.  He has been a farmer for several years and wants to grow and generate more income.

This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He has no problems with his property but does want it to become productive.  He has not taken any loans from State-owned banks.  FUDECOSUR offered the loan with the easiest terms and a much lower interest rate.

His goals are to generate profits for his wellbeing and to provide a better quality of life for his family.  He also wants to produce income to repay the loan and hopes that he will have some left over for the seasons when there are no harvests or when the land is fallow.

loans.use: For bean planting and help with tiquisque (starchy tuber).

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary M. established Mary’s Floor World in 1985 after working for a flooring company for several years. Her business did very well due to her expertise in flooring and her business-savvy nature. However, Hurricane Katrina devastated the office that she had just renovated and diminished her clientele. It has been a long road to recovery since the damaging disaster. After finally building her business to what it once was, the oil spill has affected Mary’s Floor World as well. People are not investing in their homes, corporations are hiring other large companies to renovate commercially instead of hiring small businesses, and many locals are without jobs. Small businesses in her city are struggling but with the new mayor and police chief’s dedication to recovery, Mary is incredibly hopeful that New Orleans will return to the city it once was. 

Mary says, “Since Katrina and the recent oil spill, everything has been chaos.” She took out her first loan earlier this year with ACCION Texas-Louisiana to finance a major job. “Normally, I would have never needed to go to anyone to finance a job, but I need funds and the bank rejected my loan application.” She paid back the loan within 30 days after the job was completed. This large contract was crucial to her success because with the profit she made from that job, she has been able to finance smaller contracts. With this recent loan, she will finally have the means to do the necessary repairs and renovations to her office that will communicate to the public her business’s full recovery from the hurricane and the oil spill. 

Mary is hopeful that the city of New Orleans will get back on its feet again and that the local businesses will thrive. Her advice to small business owners is, “If you really want your business to succeed, you have to hang in there no matter how bad it is. Sometimes, it gets pretty tough. You just cannot give up.”

loans.use: Renovating the Office

loans.name: Wasty Leydie

texts.fr: Cette dame est mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle a 39 ans. Pour participer au menage, elle fait la vente de chemise, sacs de sortie dame, chausure, maïs et igname. Ell achète  au grand marché de Lomé et revend à agbaléfedo. Elle cumule 5 ans dans cette acctivité. Avec le credit sollicité, elle compte accroitre sa mage beneficiaire.
texts.en: This woman is married and the mother of two. She is 39 years old. In order to help support her family, she sells shirts, ladies’ handbags, shoes, corn and yams. She stocks up at the big market of Lomé and resells in Agbaléfedo. She has five years of experience. With the loan she is seeking she hopes to increase her revenue margin.

loans.use: Purchasing shirts, shoes and miscellaneous items

loans.name: Awa Ablowa

texts.fr: Agée de 50 ans, Awa est mariée et a 3 enfants en charge. Pour aider son mari au foyer, fait la vente des produits d’alimentations générale . Elle fait 10 ans dans cette activité. Elle achète au grand marché de Lomé et revend au marché local d’agoe assiyéyé. Elle a eu des prêts qui sont remboursés . Pour repondre au mieux à la demande, elle sollicite un credit pour acheter 5 sacs de riz et 2 bidond d’huile.
texts.en: 50 years old, Awa is married with three dependent children. IN order to help her husband provide for the family, she sells  general food products. She has been in this business for 10 years. She stocks up at the big market of Lomé and resells at the local market of Agoe Assiyéyé. She had prior loans, all duly repaid. In order to better meet customer demand, she is seeking a loan to purchase five bags of rice and two jugs of oil.

loans.use: Purchasing general food products

loans.name: Mujeres Exitosas Group

texts.es:
DOÑA GLORIA APARECE EN LA FOTO Y ES LA MUJER QUE VISTE UNA SUDADERA ROSA Y UN SOMBRERO DE COLOR ROSA,  LAS DEMAS MUJERES SON LAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO "MUJERES EXITOSAS" Y ESTAN PRESENTES EN LA CASA DE DOÑA GLORIA. 

DOÑA GLORIA ES UNA MUJER TRABAJADORA Y MUY ACTIVA,  EL GRUPO AL QUE PERTENECE DOÑA GLORIA SE HACE LLAMAR: 
“MUJERES EXITOSAS" , TODAS LAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO DECIDIERON LLAMARCE ASI  POR QUE QUIEREN SER EXITOSAS EN TODO LO QUE HAGAN, DOÑA GLORIA ES LA LIDER DE ESTE GRUPO Y VIVE ES SAN JUAN TUXTEPEC BARRIO 1 QUE PERTENECE AL MUNICIPIO DE CHAPA DE MOTA  ESTADO DE MÉXICO.
DOÑA GLORIA TIENE 30 AÑOS Y ESTA CASADA ES MADRE DE 3 HIJOS Y SON VARONES:
-EL PRIMERO SE LLAMA SERGIO DE JESUS Y TIENE 12 AÑOS DE EDAD
-EL SEGUNDO SE LLAMA LUIS ANGEL TIENE 10 AÑOS
-EL TERCER HIJO  SE LLA JOSE JULIAN Y TIENE 7 AÑOS

EL ESPOSO DE DOÑA GLORIA SE LLAMA JUAN DE JESUS TIENE 36 AÑOS Y ES AYUDANTE DE ALBAÑIL,  SU ESPOSO  EN OCACIONES POR CUESTIONES DE SU  TRABAJO SALE A  LA CIUDAD DE MÉXICO POR 1 Ó 2 MESES   SIN VER A SU FAMILIA, DOÑA GLORIA ES AMA DE CASA PERO TIENE UNA ACTIVIDAD EXTRA QUE ES EL BORDADO Y VENDE SUS SERVILLETAS A LA GENTE DE SU COMUIDAD, LOS DIAS DE PLAZA PONE UN PUESTO MOSTRANDO SUS BORDADOS, LAS IMAGENES QUE BORDA PUEDEN  SER  ANIMALES COMO VENADOS, GARZAS Y OTROS, COMO TAMBIEN TODO TIPO DE FLORES.

LAS SERVILLETAS QUE BORDA DOÑA GLORIA SON DE MUCHA LABOR Y HAY QUE ESTAR HORAS Y HORAS SENTADOS PARA BORDAR, A DOÑA  GLORIA  POR LO REGULAR PARA UNA SERVILLETA CHICA TARDA 2 DIAS EN HACERLA Y PARA UN BORDADO GRANDE 2 SEMANAS COMO COBERTORES Y COLCHAS. 

LO DIFICIL  EN OCASIONES ES  BUESCAR QUIEN LO COMPRE, EN ESTOS LUGARES LA GENTE NO PAGA MUCHO POR ALGO QUE CUESTA DEMASIADO TRABAJO, DOÑA GLORIA BUSCA PERSONAS DE AFUERA DE OTROS ESTADOS O PAISES QUE  SÍ  ADMIREN SU TRABAJO Y PAGEN BIEN, ESTO ES LO DIFICIL PARA DOÑA GLORIA.

DOÑA GLORIA SE DEDICA AL BORDADO DESDE NIÑA, ES HERENCIA DE SU FAMILIA ENTRE LAS MUJERES COMO LO FUE SU MAMÁ Y ABUELA, TIENE AÑOS DE EXPERIENCIA EN ESTE OFICIO, EL BORDADO ES UN OFICIO QUE PUEDE LLEGAR A SER BIEN PAGADO Y UN NEGOCIO DE EXITO, HACE FALTA LA AYUDA PARA PODER LLEVAR BORDADOS COM0 LOS DE DOÑA GLORIA A UN LUGAR DE EXPOSICIONES EN DONDE GENTE DE AFURA LOS PUEDA VER Y PUEDA PAGAR MUY BIEN POR ESTOS BORDADOS. 

LA COMUNIDAD DE DOÑA GLORIA ES UNA COMUINIDAD DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y LA MAYORIA DE SU GENTE VIVE HUMILDEMENTE Y SE DEDICAN A CRIAR ANIMALES COMO BORREGOS Y VACAS Y AL  CULTIVO DE MAIZ, POCAS MUJERES YA EN LA ACTUALIDAD SABEN BORDAR Y SE DEDICAN A VENDERLO.

LOS INTEGRANTE DEL GRUPO DE DOÑA GLORIA SON LOS SIGUIENTES:

CARLOTA P. F. DE 63 AÑOS DE EDAD

BEATRIZ ADRIANA G. M. DE 34 AÑOS

ANA KAREN P. V. DE 19 AÑOS

ARACELI FELIPA R. T. DE 26 AÑOS

CLAUDIA RAQUEL A. B.  DE 34 AÑOS

SARA F. ASUNSION DE 45 AÑOS

GLORIA A. B. DE 30 AÑOS

LILIANA SÁNCHEZ HERNÁNDEZ DE 22 AÑOS

LILIA R. DESIDERO DE 30 AÑOS

ESTE ES EL GRUPO DE MUJERES EXITOSAS QUE TIENE DOÑA GLORIA, Y ES UN GRUPO DE MUJERES MUY UNIDAS QUE SE AYUDAN ENTRE SI PARA NO TENER PROBLEMAS Y SI LOS HAY PARA SACARLOS ADELANTE. TAMBIEN SE LLEVAN MUY BIEN Y TIENEN MUCHOS AÑOS DE CONOCERSE.
texts.en:
Ms. Gloria is the woman wearing a pink sweater and a pink hat in this picture. The other women are also members of the group "Mujeres Exitosas" which translates to "Successful Women". They are pictured at Gloria's house. 

Gloria is a hardworking and active woman. The members of the group chose the name "Successful Women" for their group because they want to be successful at everything that they do. Gloria is the leader of the group. She lives in San Juan Tuxtepec in neighborhood 1 which belongs to the municipality Chapa de Mota in the state of Mexico. 

Gloria is 30 years old, is married and is the mother of 3 boys. Her first son is named Sergio de Jesus and is 12 years old. The second is named Luis Angel and is 10 years old and the third is named Jose Julian and is seven years old.  Gloria's husband is named Juan de Jesus. He is 36 years old and is an assistant mason. Her husband sometimes has to work in Mexico City for one to two months at a time without seeing his family. 

Gloria is a homemaker but also works in embroidery and sells her napkins to people in the community. On market days she has a stall where she shows her embroidery. The images she embroiders range from animals such as deer, geese and others to all types of flowers. The napkins Gloria embroiders are labor intensive. She has to sit for hours to embroider. Generally, it takes Gloria two days to embroider a small napkin and it takes two weeks for large items such as covers and blankets. It is difficult on occasions to find someone to purchase her embroidery. In her area people do not pay much for something that is so labor intensive. Gloria looks for people from other states or countries that admire her work and pay well. 

Gloria has dedicated herself to embroidery since she was a child. It was passed down in her family from women like her mother and grandmother. She has years of experience in this field.  Embroidery is something that can eventually pay well and be a successful business. She needs help to take her embroidery to places where people from other places can see her embroidery and pay well for it. 

Gloria's community has few resources and the majority of people live humbly and raise animals such as sheep and cattle or grow corn. Currently, few women know how to embroider and sell embroidery. 

The following women are the members of Gloria's group: Carlota P. F. who is 63 years old; Beatriz Adriana G. M. who is 34 years old; Ana Karen Perez V. who is 19 years old; Araceli Felilpa R. T. who is 26 years old; Claudia Raquel A. B. who is 34 years old; Sara F. Asunsion who is 45 years old; Gloria A. B. who is 30 years old; Liliana S. H. who is 22 yearls old and Lilia R. Desidero who is 30 years old. 

This is Gloria's group of successful women and it is a group of women that is united and that help each other. They get along well and have known each other for many years.

loans.use: Purchase thread in various colors and napkins to embroider.

loans.name: Fafa Ayélévi

texts.fr: Agée de 25 ans, elle est esthéticienne de profession. Elle associe à son activité principal, la vente de produit cosmétiques, mèches et tissages. Mariée et mère de 3 enfants, elle fait 3 ans dans cette activité. Elle achète au grand marché de Lomé et revend à Lomégan. Elle demande un credit pou acheter 100 lots de mèches et 50 lots de tissage.
texts.en: Fafa Ayélév AMOUZOU-KANGNIi, age 25, is a beautician. Along with her principal business, she sells cosmetics, hair extensions and weavings. Married and the mother of three children, she has been in this business for three years.  She buys her supplies at the Lomé Grand Market and sells at Lomégan. She is requesting a loan to buy 100 lots of hair extensions and 50 lots of hair weavings.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetic products

loans.name: Nidia

texts.es:
La Sra. Nidia P. tiene 40 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 3 hijos, todos estudiantes de la secundaria.
La Sra. Nidia junto con su conyuge se dedica a la compra venta de pescados de todas sus variedades. Esta actividad lo realiza hace más de 20 años, se inicio comercializando primeramente con la pesca directa del río, como lo hicieron sus padres, luego comercializo con mayor cantidad vendiendo en un puesto de venta en el mercado municipal.
Actualmente comercializa en el mercado y posee un comedor donde realiza diferentes tipos de alimentos a base de pescado..
Solicita el crédito para la compra de diversas variedad de pescados.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nidia P., 40, is married and has three children, all in secondary school.  Nidia and her spouse have been fish merchants for over 20 years; they sell all kinds of fish.  She started out primarily selling fish directly from the river the same as her parents had done.  Later she began to sell a greater variety in a stall in the municipal market.  She now sells in the market and also has an eatery where she prepares different fish-based dishes.

She is asking for funds to buy a variety of kinds of fish.

loans.use: To buy fish.

loans.name: Cruzero Group

texts.es:
Esta  foto fue tomada en la granja porcina de la Sra. Blanca S.,  la cual es integrante D. grupo  “CRUZERO” que está ubicado en Puebla en México. Aun costado de la foto se pueden apreciar los lechones (cerdos pequeños) que ella cría con mucho empeño. Ella se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos, negocio que inicio hace 10 años .Solicita  el préstamo para la compra de alimento para cerdos.  Sus clientes  prefieren comprarle los cerdos a ella por dar una carne de calidad y limpia. En este momento se siente contenta por este nuevo préstamo ya que piensa invertir en la construcción de más chiqueros (lugar donde se crían). Tiene 51 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer año de primaria, es casada y tiene una  sola hija. Espera que con la construcción de los chiqueros  tenga más espacio para aumentar la producción.El grupo está conformado por 12 integrantes y es la segunda  vez que solicitan un crédito en CrediComún
Observación: Al momento de capturar la fotografía la señora Teresa E. se movió un poquito, pero si se alcanza a ver.
texts.en:
This photo was taken on the pig farm belonging to Blanca S. who is a member of the 'CRUZERO' group which is located in Puebla in Mexico.  To one side of the photo you can see the 'lechones' (young pigs) which she puts a lot of effort into raising.  She raises and sells pigs and started her business  10 years ago.  She is requesting this loan to buy feed for her pigs.  Her customers prefer to buy their pigs from her because she provides them with high quality and clean meat.  Right now she is happy about this new loan because she plans to invest in the building of more pigsties (where the pigs are raised).  She is 51 years old and studied up to the third year of elementary school.  She is married and has one daughter.  She hopes that with the building of the pigsties she will have more space to increase her production.  The group has 12 members and this is the second time that they have requested a loan from CrediComún.

Note: At the moment the photo was taken Mrs Teresa E. moved a little bit but she can still be seen.

loans.use: To invest in her business

loans.name: Falilatou

texts.fr: Cette femme est mariée et à 37 ans. Pour aider au menage, elle fait le commerce de pagnes et bijoux. Elle cumule 20 ans dans cette activité et a eu plusieurs credits qui ont été remboursés. Elle s’approvisione à Lomé et revend à la devanture de sa maison. Le credit demandé sera essentiellement destiné à l’achat de 25 paires de pagnes et un lot de bijoux .
texts.en: This woman is married and is 37 years old. To help her household, she sells pagnes (a type of brightly-printed West African cloth) and jewelry. She has gained 20 years' worth of experience in this business and has obtained and repaid many loans. She gets her supplies in Lomé and re-sells them in front of her house. The loan she is seeking will be used to buy 25 sets of pagnes and one batch of jewelry.

loans.use: To buy pagnes (a type of West African cloth) and jewelry

loans.name: Aïcha

texts.fr: aïcha est veuve et mère de 3 enfants. Pour ameliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants, elle fait le cemmerce de produit de beauté. Elle a 45 ans et compte dans cette activité 20 ans. Elle a remboursé plusieurs credits déjà. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé et revend à la devanture de sa maison. Avec le credit sollicité, elle pense repondre au mieux à sa clientèle.
texts.en: Aïcha is a widowed mother of 3 children. To improve her children's living conditions, she runs a business selling cosmetics. She is 45 years old and has been engaged in this activity for 20 years. She has already repaid several loans. She gets her supplies at the grand market in Lomé and re-sells them in front of her house. With the loan she is seeking, she intends to respond to her clientele as best she can.

loans.use: To buy and re-sell cosmetics

loans.name: Rita

texts.es:
La Sra. Rita V. tiene 68 años de edad, esta en pareja y tienen un solo hijo de profesión periodista.
La Sra. Rita es propietaria de una microempresa hace más de 40 años, inicialmente administraba una despensa y  con la apertura de las grandes cadenas de supermercados se vio obligada a buscar otras mercaderías,  y luego cambio de ramo realizando solo la venta de bebidas y minutas en su domicilio.
Actualmente posee una clientela formada.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de mercaderías tales como: gaseosas,vinos,cervezas y otros.
texts.en:
Mrs Rita V. is 68 years old.  She lives with her partner and they have one son who is a journalist.

Rita has owned her own small business for more than 40 years.  Initially, she ran a small grocery store but with the opening of the large supermarket chains she had to look for other merchandise and then she changed her business, selling only drinks and snacks in her home.

She currently has an existing customer base.

She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as soda, wine and beer, etc.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as soda, wine, beer, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy manure for the Tiquisque (a starchy tuber) crops.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
El Sr. R. Diaz tiene 47  años de edad, esta casado y tiene 2 hijas una de ella en edad escolar y la otra en nivel universitario.
El  es constructor de obras, empezo cuando tenia 20 años como ayudante albañil y de a poco fue aprendiendo la profesion hasta que llegó a ser constructor de obras,su sueño siempre fue independizarse hasta que lo logró.
Solicita el credito para la compra de ladrillos y cemento para agrandar su casa ya que su sra posee un pequeño almacen.
texts.en:
Mr R. Diaz is 47 years old.  He is married and has 2 daughters, one is school age and the other is at university level.

He is a builder.  He started out when he was 20 years old as an assistant bricklayer and learned the trade until he became a builder working on building sites.  His dream was always to become independent which he did.

He is requesting this loan to buy bricks and cement to extend his house since his wife owns a small grocery store.

loans.use: To buy bricks and cement

loans.name: Maria Graciela

texts.es: Doña Maria Sapón, es una señora casada,tiene 52 años, tiene 8 hijos, 1 varon y 7 mujeres, se dedica a la artesanía, enmadejado de hilo asimismo se dedica a la venta y reparación de maquinas de costura,con estos trabajos ha logrado sostener a su familia, ya que tien el ingreso mensual que necesita para sufragar las gastos familiares, con el proposito de ampliar su capital, ha decidido solicitar un préstamo y asi poder comprar mas materia prima enb este caso hilo para seguir produciendo mas, espera que por medio de dicho préstamo logre trabajar mas y a la vez verder mas y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mrs. María Sapón, 52, is married and has 8 children, one boy and 7 girls.  She is a weaver and also repairs and sells sewing machines.  These jobs have made it possible for her to support her family since they produce monthly income she needs to meet family expenses.

To expand her capital she decided to request a loan to buy more raw materials, in this case thread, to continue producing more.  She hopes the loan will allow her to work more leading to more sales and obtaining increased income.

loans.use: To buy thread.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es: Faustino, de 42 años, es un hombre muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Aidé de 27 años y su querida hija Tania de 10 años, quienes son el principal motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. En la ciudad de San Francisco, el hombre con más experiencia en los levantamientos de paredes y techados de casas es Faustino, todos los días junto a los trabajadores que él comanda, construyen las casas de los moradores de esta ciudad, los cuales conocedores de los bueno trabajos que realizan, siempre los contratan. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es construir, ya que así siente que ayuda en el progreso y expansión de su ciudad natal, lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es manejar objetos pesados, como ladrillos, fierros, etc. Con el tiempo, desea poner un negocio, con el cual pueda mejorar sus ingresos económicos. Es el primer crédito con MFP y se siente en la capacidad de pagar todas sus cuotas, es uno de los miembros más activos en su banco comunal, por eso es muy querido y respetado. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados planea comprar productos de primera necesidad, para ayudara a su esposa tener un negocio, y para ello instalarán una tienda.
texts.en:
Faustino, 42, is a cheerful, hard working man.  He lives in his own house with his wife, Aidé, 27, and his beloved daughter, Tania, 10, who are the motivating forces behind his every effort.

Faustino is the most experienced person in erecting walls and installing roofing in the city of San Francisco.  Every day, with the laborers he leads, they build houses for residents of this city who, knowing the good work they do, always hire them.

What he likes best about his work is building because he feels he’s helping his native city grow and expand.  He has been in this business for 8 years and considers the most difficult part of it carrying the heavy objects, like bricks and metal rods, etc. In time he wants to set up a business that will improve his income.

This is his first loan with MFP and he feels able to repay all his installments.  He is one of the most active members of his communal bank so he is highly respected and esteemed.

He will use the requested 100 new soles to buy basic need items to help his wife have a business; they will open a store.

loans.use: To buy stock items for his wife's store.

loans.name: Leoncia

texts.es: Leoncia, D. 66 años, es una mujer que siempre a trabajado muy duro por sobre salir en la vida, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Fortunato D. 67 años y lo que más desea es vivir una vejez tranquila. La actividad a la que se dedica Leoncia, es la venta D. ropa, en su puesto ubicado en el mercado “Gamarrita D. la ciudad D. San Francisco”, todos los días atienD. a muchos compradores, quienes sabiendo D. la buena calidad y lo novedoso D. las prendas que ella misma trae desD. la ciudad D. Lima, no dudan en comprarle grandes cantidades D. ropa. Lo que más le gusta D. su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientas sobre las prendas que están D. moda en la capital, ya que así pueD. ganarse su confianza, lleva 48 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer en su puesto D. ventas por largas horas, en espera D. clientes. Con el tiempo, espera poder ampliar su puesto para poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor comodidad. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP y esta ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias D. su banco comunal, donD. se siente muy contenta. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ropa D. la ciudad D. Lima, para implementar mejor su puesto D. ventas.
texts.en: Leoncia is 66 years old. She is a woman who has always worked very hard to get ahead in life. She lives in her own home with her husband Fortunato, who is 67. What she wants the most is to have a calm old age. The activity Leoncia does is selling clothes in her stall located in the “Gamarrita D. la ciudad D. San Francisco” market. Everyday she serves many buyers who know her good quality and the latest fashion of the clothing she brings from the city of Lima. They don't hesitate to buy large quantities of clothing. What she likes the most about her job is advising customers about the clothing that is in style in the capital. This way she earns their trust. She has been doing this for 48 years and she thinks that the hardest thing is staying at her stall for long hours, waiting for customers.  With time, she hopes to expand her stall to be able to offer customers more comfort. This is her fifth loan with MFP and she is saving to be able to make her payments on time since she doesn't want to cause trouble for the members of her communal bank, where she feels very happy. With the thousand soles she has asked for, she will buy more clothes in the city of Lima, to better outfit her sales stall.

loans.use: To buy more clothes in the city of Lima to better supply her business.

loans.name: Santos Brigido

texts.es: Santo Brigido, tiene 19 años de edad, estado civil soltero, se dedica a la artesania en este caso la tejeduria, teje servilletas las que son comercializadas en el pueblo de san Francisco el Alto,este negocio es propio de Santos Brigido. Este trabajo le ha dejado buenas ganancias y con este a estado contribuyendo a los gastos familiares,y quiere ampliar su capital de trabajo, para comprar materia prima y asi poder elaborar mas tejidos y devengar mejores ganancias, ya que tiene espíritu de emprendedor. Quiere tener exito en la vida por eso solicita dicho préstamo para ampliar el capital de su propio negocio,
texts.en: Santo Brigido is 19 years old, single and works in the handicrafts business.  His craft is weaving.  He weaves napkins which are sold in the town of San Francisco El Alto.  It is his own business.  The work has made him good profits with which he has been contributing to his family's expenses.  He would like to increase his working capital in order to buy raw materials so that he can do more weaving and earn more proit since he has an entrepreneurial spirit.  He would like to be successful in life which is why he is requesting this loan to increase the capital of his own business.

loans.use: To increase his working capital

loans.name: Maria Araceli

texts.es: La Sra.Maria Araceli C. es una persona muy trabajadora y honrada es empleada domestica en una casa y  tiene 3 años laborando tambien en una  empresa, su esposo trabaja en una compañía recicladora en el cual tiene laborando 6 meses, ellos son un familia muy unida y siempre trabajando en conjunto para el mejoramiento de la misma, entre los dos poco a poco han ido terminando su casa para la comodidad propia y su familia, el credito lo solicitaron para terminar el acabado de su losa de concreto y mejorar el ambiente familiar. Asi como darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Maria is a very hard-working and honest woman who works as a housekeeper. She has three children and also works for a business. For six months her husband has worked for a recycling company. They are a very united family and are always working together to improve themselves, and between the two they have slowly worked to finish their home and make it more comfortable for their family. The loan that they request is to finish a concrete floor and improve the living environment. In this way they can give a better quality of life to their children.

loans.use: Contruccion de una losa de concreto.

loans.name: 29 De Septiembre Group

texts.es:
El comité “29 de Setiembre” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Limpio.
 Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes  ,  como son las ventas, preparación de comidas rápidas.
 Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. 

La Señora Graciela es una de las integrantes del comité, ella se dedica  a la  venta de productos de limpieza varias para la comunidad.
En fin realiza realiza varias actividades, es un señora muy creativa y sus clientes quedan muy admirados con sus trabajos. 
Ella tiene una familia muy unidad con 4  hijos y su marido es empleado.
Se encuentra muy satisfecha con su actividad y las capacitaciones que recibe el grupo.
La señora Graciela solicita el crédito para la ampliacion de su ventas de producto de limpieza.
texts.en:
The "September 29" committee was formed through the union of a group of neighbors in the city of Limpio. All of the committee members have independent work activities, such as sales or fast food preparation. 

The members have formed a group that is very united and able to undertake shared activities that strengthen their sense of teamwork. 

Graciela is one of the members of the committee. Her work is selling assorted cleaning products in her community. In fact, she carries out a range of activities; she is a very creative woman, and her customers admire her very much for her hard work. She has a very united family,  with 4 children and her husband, who is an employee.  

Graciela is very satisfied with her work and with the training that the group receives. She is requesting the loan to expand her sales of cleaning products.

loans.use: Buying cleaning products to sell

loans.name: Mujeres De Paso Correo Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres de Paso Correo” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Limpio.
 Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes,  como son las ventas, preparación de comidas rápidas, algunas van a empezar a emprender actividades independientes con el crédito obtenido por la Fundación Paraguaya.
 Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. 

La Señora Gladys es una de las integrantes del comité, ella se dedica  a la compra y ventas de mercaderías  en General. 
Todos sus clientes quedan muy admirados con sus trabajos. 
Ella tiene una familia muy unida con 2  hijos y su marido quien trabaja Albañil. 
La señora Gladys solicita el crédito para la compra de más mercaderías para poder ampliar su negocio, como lácteos, panificados, enlatados y otros.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres de Paso Correo” group was formed with the union of several residents of the city of Limpio.

All of the members of the committee perform independent activities such as sales and preparation of fast food. Some of them are going to begin performing independent activities with the loan from the Fundación Paraguaya.

The members formed a very close group that is capable of carrying out activities together that strengthen their companionship.  

Gladys is one of the committee members. She works buying and selling general merchandise. All of her customers really admire her work. She has a very close family with two children and a husband who works as a bricklayer. Gladys is asking for the loan to buy more merchandise to expand her business, such as dairy products, baked goods, canned goods, and more.  .

loans.use: To buy canned goods, baked goods, dairy products and more.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel de 43 años, tiene una pequeña papelería, vive en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Desde pequeño el comenzó a trabajar como obrero en construcciones para así tener su propio dinero y ayudar a sus padres. Poco a poco con algunos ahorros compro papelería y ubico su negocio en un local. En la actualidad el tiene su papelería con unas rejas muy gruesas para tener mas seguridad debido a la delincuencia del sector. Aunque tiene su negocio sigue trabajando como maestro constructor con ayuda de su esposa.  

Con el préstamo quiere comprar papelería, cuadernos para surtir mas su negocio. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y hacer mas grande su negocio.
texts.en:
43-year old Manuel runs a small stationery store. He lives in the suburban area called Duran, which has a deteriorating ecosystem, located on the outskirts of Guayaquil.

As a young boy he started work as a labourer in the construction industry so he could have his own money and help his parents. Over time he saved enough money to buy stationery and set up a stall. Nowadays he has a store with very thick burglar bars for security as there is a lot of crime in the area. Although he has his business, he continues to work as a construction supervisor with help from his wife.

With the loan Manuel wants to buy more stock such as notebooks. His future plans include finishing building his house and expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy stationery, notebooks etc

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Domingo Agüero Rodríguez, tiene la edad de 30 años, es soltero. El quiere comprar una vaca para la explotación de esta en el campo de la producción de leche. Además, su finca es apta para el mantenimiento de estos animales y su buena explotación. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer como un  productor de leche de la zona. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no ha tenido problemas en su propiedad, pero si tiene el deseo de que sea una finca productiva. El no ha realizados otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El tiene como meta llegar a generar ganancias para su bienestar en el futuro y seguir creciendo en el negocio de la producción de leche.
texts.en:
30-year old Domingo Agüero Rodríguez is single. He wishes to buy a cow so he will have milk to sell. The land he owns is very suitable for cows and milk production. Domingo has been a farmer for several years and wishes to expand into dairy farming.

This is his first loan from Kiva partner FUDECOSUR. He has no problems with his property but does want it to become a productive farm. He has not had loans with other banks. FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with easier terms and a much lower interest rate.

Domingo’s goal is to generate more income to support himself in the future and to continue expanding the milk production business.

loans.use: to buy a cow

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Hermez Antonio

texts.es: Hermes Antonio Méndez Rodríguez, el está en unión libre y vive con su mujer. El quiere comprar la semilla del tomate para su siembra posteriormente al igual que su producción. Además, su finca es apta para la explotación de este cultivo y su buena producción. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer como un  productor de tomate de la zona. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no ha tenido problemas en su propiedad, pero si tiene el deseo de que sea una finca productiva y ejemplo para los demás productores. El no ha realizados otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El tiene como meta llegar a generar ganancias para su bienestar propio y de su mujer  en el futuro y seguir creciendo en el negocio de la producción de tomate y también crecer como persona.
texts.en:
Hermes Antonio Méndez Rodríguez lives with his common-law wife. He wishes to buy tomato seeds so he can plant a crop and harvest the tomatoes. His land is very suitable for growing and harvesting tomatoes. He has been a farmer for several years and wishes to expand into tomato production.

This is his first loan from Kiva partner FUDECOSUR. He has no problems with his property but does want it to become a productive farm. He has not had loans with other banks. FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with easier terms and a much lower interest rate.

Domingo’s goal is to generate more income to support himself and his partner in the future, to continue expanding the tomato business, and to grow as a person.

loans.use: to plant a tomato crop

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Cement, sand, blocks

loans.name: Condori Villena

texts.es:
M. es socia del Banco Comunal “Sol de Oro”  ubicado en el distrito de Juliaca,  provincia de San Román, departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, de estado civil  conviviente y tiene 02  hijos,  la señora tiene estudios hasta 2do de educación secundaria.

M. viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 05 años, con un préstamo inicial de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que incrementó en el capital de  su negocio de venta de abarrotes así como también pollos y frutas.

La señora solicitará un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio.

Su sueño es tener más capital y que sus hijos sean profesionales..

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es lo que gana en el ahorro.
texts.en:
M. is a member of the communal bank “Sol de Oro” (Golden Sun), located in the district of Juliaca, San Román province, in the Puno region. She is 42 years old, in a common law marriage, and has 2 children. She is schooled through the 2nd grade of secondary school. 

M. has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 5 years. She started with an initial loan of 300.00 soles, money that increased the capital of her grocery, chicken and fruit sales business. She will ask for a new loan of 1000.00 soles, money that she will invest in the purchase of grocery goods for her business. 

Her dream is to have more capital and for her children to be professionals. The thing she likes most about the communal bank is what she gains in savings.

loans.use: To buy grocery goods for her business selling grocery staples, fruit and chicken.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es:
Maria Catalina G. M. tiene 25 años. Es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Guaranda en la Provincia de Bolívar.   Tiene 4 hijos.

Maria pertenece a la Ventanilla  Guantucoto ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería especialmente a la siembra de maíz y papas en la zona de la sierra y en la zona de la costa al arroz, esta ventanilla tiene 25 miembros.

María  se dedica a la agricultura por varios años,  siembra maíz y papa, además tiene animales de cría y ganado para luego vender,  las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, papa. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Enfrentan desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar tierras y una casa propia para la familia.
Le gusta  limpiar la casa y pasar tiempo con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria Catalina G. M. is 25 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and children. She lives in the Guaranda canton in the Bolívar province. She has 4 children.

Maria is part of Ventanilla Guantucoto (Service Point Guantucoto), located a half-hour from Guaranda. This is a group that makes a living in agriculture and livestock, especially in the cultivation of corn and potatoes in the mountain zone, and rice in the coastal zone. This service point has 25 members. 

María has made a living in agriculture for many years. She cultivates corn and potatoes and also raises animals and livestock to later sell. She does her shopping in Guaranda and she sells her products in the wholesale market in the same city.

She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers for the sowing of corn and potatoes. The loan would help her economically to supplement family necessities. They face challenges such as crop plagues and sicknesses. Her dream is to buy land and to own a house for the family. She likes cleaning the house and spending time with her children.

loans.use: Fertilizer for sowing corn.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
Martina es socia del Banco Comunal “Santiago Apóstol” ubicado en el distrito de Paucarcolla, provincia de Puno, departamento de Puno, tiene 57 años de edad de estado civil casada, con cuatro hijos y con grado de instrucción de segundo de primaria.
Martina viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho años, el primer préstamo solicitado fue de S/ 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual le sirvió para incrementar el capital de su negocio de venta de golosinas y refresco de cebada.
Ahora solicitara un nuevo préstamo de S/ 400.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que le permitirá incrementar la mercadería de su negocio.
Su sueño es seguir adelante con su negocio.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son los ahorros que generan las ganancias, plazo de trabajo  y los regalos.
texts.en:
Martina is a member of the Communal Bank “Santiago Apóstol”, which is located in the District of Paucarcolla, Province and Department of Puno. She is 57 years old, married, and has four children. Martina has a secondary grade education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for eight years. The first loan she requested was in the amount of 300 PEN, which was used to increase her business capital for selling candy and barley soda.

Martina is now requesting a new loan in the amount of 400 PEN so that she can increase her inventory of merchandise for her business. Her dream is to move forward with her business. What she enjoys most about her Communal Bank are the savings that generate income, the working terms, and the gifts.

loans.use: Increase her inventory of candy

loans.name: Luis Angel

texts.es:
Luis Angel B. Milán tiene 35 años. Es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Guaranda en la Provincia de Bolívar.   Tiene 3 hijos.

Luis pertenece a la Ventanilla  Guantucoto ubicada a media hora de Guaranda perteneciente, es un grupo que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería especialmente a la siembra de maíz y papas en la zona de la sierra y en la zona de la costa al arroz, esta ventanilla tiene 25 miembros.

Luis  se dedica a la agricultura por varios años,  siembra maíz y papa, además tiene animales de cría y ganado para luego vender,  las comprar las realiza en Guaranda y vende en el mercado mayorista de la  misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para la siembra maíz, papa. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades de la familia. Enfrentan desafíos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar tierras u un carro.
Le gusta  visitar a la familia y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Luis Angel B. Milán is 35 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Guaranda in Bolívar Province. He has three children.

Luis is a member of the Guantucoto Communal Bank, which is located a half hour from Guaranda. This group engages in farming and ranching, especially corn and potato production in the mountainous areas as well as in the coastal region where rice is grown. The Communal Bank has 25 members.

Luis has been farming for several years, growing potatoes and corn. He also raises and sells livestock animals. Luis buys his supplies in Guaranda and sells at the wholesale market in the same city.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for growing corn and potatoes. With the help of this loan, he will have the financial resources to acquire necessities for his family. The challenges he faces include pests and diseases that can impact his crops. His dream is to buy more farmland and a car.

Luis enjoys visiting his family and playing sports.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for growing potatoes & corn

Cristina is a member of the Guantucoto Communal Bank, which is located a half hour from Guaranda. This group engages in farming and ranching, especially corn and potato production in the mountainous areas as well as in the coastal region where rice is grown. The Communal Bank has 25 members.

Cristina has been farming for several years, growing potatoes and corn. She also raises and sells livestock animals. Cristina buys her supplies in Guaranda and sells at the wholesale market in the same city.

Cristina enjoys dancing to all types of music.

loans.name: Omar Xavier

texts.es:
Omar de 33 años, es vendedor de morocho (postre típico ecuatoriano elaborado con leches, grano morocho, vainilla). vive en una zona periurbana ubicada a las afuera de Guayaquil llamada Duran y caracterizada por su ecología de disolución. 

Aprendió la actividad en una empresa que elabora morocho. Trabajo por un tiempo hasta que se independizo y quiso tener su propio negocio de morocho. Hace el morocho todos los días en el patio de su casa con una paila, le ayudan dos personas a vender los vasos de morocho desde muy temprano hasta que se acaba lo que prepara para el día. Uno de los problemas es el transporte ya que vende el morocho en las calles Guayaquil. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar ollas para elaborar con mas cuidado el morocho y leche. En el futuro quiere tener su propio local y ser un distribuidor al por mayor del producto.
texts.en:
Omar is 33 years old and sells “morocho” (a traditional Ecuadorian treat made of milk, ground corn, and vanilla). He lives in a periurban area outside of Guayaquil called Duran, which is known for its deteriorating ecosystem.

Omar learned this trade at a business that makes “morocho”. He worked there for some time until he decided to become independent and start his own business. Omar makes the “morocho” every day in a large pot on the patio of his house. With the help of two assistants, he sells containers of “morocho” starting in the early morning hours until he runs out of what he has prepared for the day. One of his problems is transportation since he sells the “morocho” in the streets of Guayaquil.

With this loan, Omar will buy supplies for making “morocho” such as pots and milk. In the future, he wants to have his own shop and become a wholesale distributor of this product.

loans.use: Purchase pots & milk

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres Activas” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso.
 Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes,  como son las ventas, preparación de comidas rápidas.
 Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. 

La Señora Roció es una de las integrantes del comité, y se dedica a la fabricación de bijouterie.
Ella compra los accesorios, y fabrica pulseras, gargantillas, aros y bordados en zapatillas y otros. Todos los trabajos son muy admirados y muy solicitados por los clientes.
Con los créditos que ella recibe junto a las demás socias del comité compra los accesorios de acuerdo a los pedidos, y a los gustos de los clientes. 
En esta ocasión solicita nuevamente el crédito para la compra de lentejuelas, mostacillas, flores artificiales, zapatillas y otros. 
 Ella tiene una familia muy unidad con 2  hijos y su marido es constructor de obras.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Activas” (Active Women) Committee was formed by several neighbors from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso who decided to join together. All of the committee members have developed independent businesses, such as preparing and selling fast food. The members who make up this group are very close and work together in their activities to strengthen their friendship.

Sra. Roció is one of the committee members who makes trinkets. She buys the accessories and produces bracelets, necklaces, earrings, embroidered slippers, and other items. All of her works are greatly admired and in great demand among her customers. With the loans that she will receive along with the other committee members, Roció will buy accessories based on the orders and preferences of her customers. Upon receiving this new loan she plans to buy sequins, beads, artificial flowers, slippers, and other items. She has a very close family, which consists of two children and a husband who works in construction.

loans.use: Purchase sequins, beads, artificial flowers, slippers, and other items

loans.name: Ignacia

texts.es:
Ignacia es una microempresaria dedicada las ventas de animales y carnes. Su negocio se encuentra en la ciudad de Hato Mayor, una ciudad dedicada a la agricultura al noreste del pais. Está asociada de Esperanza comenzó con nosotros porque necesitaba invertir en su negocio el cuál inicio con su primer prestamo hace ya Seis años, teniendo en el dia de hoy una Carniceria. Es madre de 4 hijos, los cuales ha criado junto a su esposo, siendo este su mas dificil reto o desafio, ya que siempre ha trabajado para llevar mas ingreso a su Hogar. Disfruta estar siempre activa, trabajar es su actividad favorita por lo que siempre busca algo que hacer, como estar en su negocio o limpiar la casa.

Ignacia está muy emocionada de recibir su 11vo. préstamo en Esperanza Internacional, después de haber pagado satisfactoriamente sus préstamos anteriores y haber dado un paso para el crecimiento de su negocio. Ella ha tenido su negocio por alrededor de 6 años. Va a invertir su nuevo préstamo en la compra de animales como Chivos y Carnes de res, tambien piensa aprovechar las fiestas navideñas y el consumo de carne de cerdo. Ella va a utilizar sus ganancias para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio e ir ahorrando para poder ayudar a que sus hijos puedan ser profesionales, lo cual es su sueño mas anhelado.
texts.en:
Ignacia is a micro-entrepreneur who sells animals and meat. Her business is located in Hato Mayor, an agricultural city in the northeast part of the country. She joined Esperanza because she wanted to invest in her business. Ignacia received her first loan six years ago and today she manages a butcher shop. She is a mother of four children who she is raising along with her husband, which can be a difficult challenge. Ignacia is always working to bring more income into her household. She enjoys staying active. Working is her favorite activity because she is always looking for something to do, whether it be running her business or cleaning her house.

Ignacia is very excited about receiving her eleventh loan from Esperanza International, having successfully repaid her previous loans and taken steps to grow her business. She has been in business for approximately six years. Ignacia will invest this new loan in the purchase of animals, such as goats and beef cattle. In addition, she plans to take advantage of the holiday seasons when pork is consumed. She will use her earnings to continue reinvesting in her business and accumulate savings so that her children can become professionals, which is her greatest dream.

loans.use: Purchase goats & beef cattle
